        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="atfMarker" id="atfMarker_feature_div">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-html-atf-marker');};
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="tradeInButton" id="tradeInButton_feature_div">
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="sellYoursHere" id="sellYoursHere_feature_div">
      <div class="a-section a-spacing-base">
       <div class="a-box">
        <div class="a-box-inner">
         <div class="a-row">
          <div class="a-column a-span6">
           Have one to sell?
          </div>
          <div class="a-column a-span6 a-text-right a-span-last">
           <span class="a-button a-button-small">
            <span class="a-button-inner">
             <a class="a-button-text" href="http://catalog-retail.amazon.com/abis/syh/DisplayCondition/ref=dp_sdp_sell?_encoding=UTF8&amp;colid=&amp;asin=0765348799&amp;ld=AMZDP&amp;sr=&amp;qid=&amp;coliid=">
              Sell on Amazon
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="leftCol">
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="booksImageBlock" id="booksImageBlock_feature_div">
      <div class="a-row" id="imageBlockOuter">
       <div id="sitbLogo">

       <script type="text/javascript">
        P.when("A","jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {	
	function getWindowWidth() {
		return window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
	}
	function getWindowHeight() {
		return document.documentElement.clientHeight;
	}
	function setGalleryDimensions() {
		var widthRatio = 0.75,
		    heightDiff = 100,
		    $trigger = $("#imgThumbs"),
		    data = $trigger.data("a-modal");
		
		data.width = getWindowWidth() * widthRatio;
		data.height = getWindowHeight() - heightDiff;
		$trigger.data("a-modal", data);
		
	}	
	setGalleryDimensions();
	A.on("resize", setGalleryDimensions);
});
       </script>
       <div class="collections-collect-button">
       </div>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(true){

		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,

	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.6213872832369942,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/711YZS5d4XL.jpg","dimensions":[657,1062],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/711YZS5d4XL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"},{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71t9Tuq8AWL.jpg","dimensions":[600,1019],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71t9Tuq8AWL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});

      <script type="text/javascript">
       amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.criticalFeature", function() {
amznJQ.available("popover", function() {
    var acr = jQuery("#averageCustomerReviews");
    var dest = "/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?ref=" + acr.attr("data-ref") + 
               "&link=1&seeall=1&ASIN=" + acr.attr("data-asin");
    acr.find(".reviewCountTextLinkedHistogram").amazonPopoverTrigger({
        destination: dest,
        group: "reviewsPopover",
        hoverHideDelay:300,
        location:"bottom",
        locationAlign:"left",
        locationOffset:[-20,-2],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        onShow: function(popover) { 
            jQuery(document).click(); 
        }
    })
});
});

      </script>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3Cdiv%3EIn%20the%20vast%20dominion%20of%20Seven%20Cities%2C%20in%20the%20Holy%20Desert%20Raraku%2C%20the%20seer%20Sha%27ik%20and%20her%20followers%20prepare%20for%20the%20long-prophesied%20uprising%20known%20as%20the%20Whirlwind.%20Unprecedented%20in%20size%20and%20savagery%2C%20this%20maelstrom%20of%20fanaticism%20and%20bloodlust%20will%20embroil%20the%20Malazan%20Empire%20in%20one%20of%20the%20bloodiest%20conflicts%20it%20has%20ever%20known%2C%20shaping%20destinies%20and%20giving%20birth%20to%20legends%20.%20.%20.%20%3Cbr%3ESet%20in%20a%20brilliantly%20realized%20world%20ravaged%20by%20dark%2C%20uncontrollable%20magic%2C%20this%20thrilling%20novel%20of%20war%2C%20intrigue%20and%20betrayal%20confirms%20Steven%20Erikson%20as%20a%20storyteller%20of%20breathtaking%20skill%2C%20imagination%20and%20originality--the%20author%20who%20has%20written%20the%20first%20great%20fantasy%20epic%20of%20the%20new%20millennium.%3Cbr%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>

                window.vellumLjDone = true;

                s.type = 'text/css';

                var nt = st + (h/2) - (vli.height()/2);

            },

            },
            c: function(a) {
                var v = Vellum;
                v.mt = 'c'; v.rg = [a]; v.pl();
            }
        }

            }

    }

  });

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });
           </script>

    <div class="bucket" id="productDescription">
     <h2>
      Editorial Reviews
     </h2>
     <div class="content">
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       From
       <a href="/gp/feature.html/?docId=1000027801">
        Booklist
       </a>
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       *Starred Review*   The second of the projected 10 volumes of the Malazan Book of the Fallen raises the stakes set by
       <i>
        Gardens of the Moon
       </i>
       [BKL My 15 04]. From the Holy Desert Raraku, in the land of the Seven Cities, the seer Sha'ik sends her followers out on a holy war known as the Whirlwind. It bears more than a passing resemblance to the current violent Islamic jihad, but Erikson's scholarship is sufficiently thorough to enable him to avoid simpleminded likeness making. His imagination is also sufficient to bring the setting of the Seven Cities vividly to life, although his realism is rather literally gritty, including a great deal of sand and gravel that will inevitably recall for some readers a country in which American troops are now fighting. The opposition to the Whirlwind is varied but includes the inevitable mercenaries, limned in the manner that stems from David Drake's sf and in fantasy is practiced particular skillfully by Glen Cook. Erikson is making his dark characters and grisly battles very much his own, however, and fantasy readers with a strong appetite for world building and action ought to enjoy his efforts. Whether they'll stay for all 10 volumes is another matter, but so far,
       <i>
        so
       </i>
       good.
       <i>
        Roland Green
       </i>
       <br/>
       <i>
        Copyright Â© American Library Association. All rights reserved
       </i>
       <em>
        --This text refers to an out of print or unavailable edition of this title.
       </em>
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       Review
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       <div>
        "Give me the evocation of a rich, complex and yet ultimately unknowable other world, with a compelling suggestion of intricate history and mythology and lore. Give me mystery amid the grand narrative. Give me a world in which every sea hides a crumbled Atlantis, every ruin has a tale to tell, every mattock blade is a silent legacy of struggles unknown. Give me, in other words, the fantasy work of Steven Erikson. Erikson is a master of lost and forgotten epochs, a weaver of ancient epics on a scale that would approach absurdity if it wasn't so much fun."--Andrew Leonard, Salon.com on
        <i>
         The Malazan Book of the Fallen
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        "Steven Erikson afflicts me with awe. Vast in scope, almost frighteningly fecund in imagination, and rich in sympathy, his work does something that only the rarest of books can manage: it alters the reader's perceptions of reality."--Stephen R. Donaldson on
        <i>
         Deadhouse Gates
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        "I stand slack-jawed in awe of The Malazan Book of the Fallen. This masterwork of imagination may be the high water mark of epic fantasy. This marathon of ambition has a depth and breadth and sense of vast reaches of inimical time unlike anything else available today. The Black Company, Zelazny's Amber, Vance's Dying Earth, and other mighty drumbeats are but foreshadowings of this dark dragon's hoard."--Glen Cook on
        <i>
         The Malazan Book of the Fallen
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        "One of the best fantasy novels of the year."--SF Site on
        <i>
         Deadhouse Gates
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        "Rare is the writer who so fluidly combines a sense of mythic power and depth of world, with fully realized characters and thrilling action, but Steven Erikson manages it spectacularly. The books are reminiscent of Tolkein's scope, Zelazny's cleverness and wit, and Donaldson's brooding atmospherics; yet all combined with dazzling talent into a narrative flow that keeps the reader turning pages. Some writers open windows on worlds, Erikson opens worlds and makes them so real, so magical, you're not sure if you can escape-and I don't want to."-Michael A. Stackpole on
        <i>
         Deadhouse Gates
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        "Such is the impact of the first book in Erikson's monumental Malazan saga,
        <i>
         Gardens of the Moon
        </i>
        , that the achievement of this sequel is doubly surprising. Not only is the vigour and sweep of the earlier book effortlessly captured, the complex plot is simultaneously deepened and accelerated, with a grasp of tempo that has the reader inexorably gripped . . . Roll on, book three!"-
        <i>
         The Good Book Guide
        </i>
        on
        <i>
         Deadhouse Gates
        </i>
        <br/>
        <i>
        </i>
        <br/>
        <i>
        </i>
        "Gripping, fast-moving, delightfully dark, with a masterful and unapologetic brutality reminiscent of George R. R. Martin. Steven Erikson brings a punchy, mesmerizing writing style into the genre of epic fantasy, making an indelible impression. Utterly engrossing."--Elizabeth Haydon on
        <i>
         Deadhouse Gates
        </i>
        <br/>
        <br/>
       </div>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       Rich, complex...Erikson is a master of lost and forgotten epochs.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       (Andrew Leonard
       <i>
        Salon
       </i>
       )
       <br/>
       <br/>
       Vast in scope, almost frighteningly fecund in imagination, and rich in sympathy.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       (Stephen R. Donaldson)
       <br/>
       <br/>
       This masterwork of imagination may be the high water mark of epic fantasy.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       (Glen Cook)
       <br/>
       <br/>
       One of the best fantasy novels of the year.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       (
       <i>
        SF Site
       </i>
       )
       <br/>
       <br/>
       Reminiscent of Tolkein's scope, Zelazny's cleverness and wit, and Donaldson's brooding atmospherics.
       <br/>
       (Michael A. Stackpole)
       <br/>
       <br/>
       Gripping, fast-moving, delightfully dark, with a masterful and unapologetic brutality reminiscent of George R. R. Martin... Utterly engrossing.
       <br/>
       (Elizabeth Haydon)
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>

        See all Editorial Reviews

       <div class="a-section" id="revMHLContainerChild">
        <div class="a-row">
         <div class="a-column a-span11" id="revMH">
          <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
           Most Helpful Customer Reviews
          </h3>
          <div class="a-section" id="revMHRL">
           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-RCIZ26FC2TUG3">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              85 of 91 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/RCIZ26FC2TUG3/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765348799&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/RCIZ26FC2TUG3/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765348799&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Absolutely stunning. A remarkable achievement.
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A2EDZH51XHFA9B/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Robert Beveridge
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#hf">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  HALL OF FAME
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#vn">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  VINE VOICE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on March 31, 2005
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-RCIZ26FC2TUG3">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               Steven Erikson, Deadhouse Gates (Tor, 2000)
               <br/>
               <br/>
               I finished up page 598 of Deadhouse Gates, and my next act was to go to my library's website and put the third book in the series, Memories of Ice, on hold.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Deadhouse Gates is Erikson's second entry in the Malazan Book of the Fallen series, which, despite its rather clumsy series name, is bang-up stuff. Few authors write martial scenes quite this well in high fantasy; Tolkein's final battle in Return of the King, Elizabeth Moon's depictions of day-to-day troop life in The Deed of Paksennarion, just about every aspect of George R. R. Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire. Yes, I'd rank Erikson with those three. Easily.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Readers of Gardens of the Moon may find themselves slightly confused when opening up Deadhouse Gates, no doubt because it takes place half a world away from Darujhistan, the city at the heart of Gardens of the Moon. You'll remember that everyone was worried, at the end of that novel, about something called the Pannion Seer. Well, you'll not see the Pannion Seer, nor most of the surviving characters from Gardens of the Moon, here (from the description I just read, that tale continues in Memories of Ice). Instead, a select few characters have fled east across the sea for various reasons, and only they link the tales.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Like Gardens of the Moon, Deadhouse Gates is an ensemble tale, but is even more sprawling in scope; at any given time, Erikson is following between two and six plot threads in alternating sections of any given chapter. There are four main plot threads, through they meander towards and away from each other, split off, and join together differently, throughout the text.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot; The first concerns a trio pressed into slavery-- an ex-priest of Fener the Boar God, a noble-born teen, and a barbarian, none of whom seem to have anything in common, yet who are forced by circumstances to forge an uneasy bond. The second revolves around Duiker, the Imperial Historian (mentioned, but never met, in Gardens of the Moon), who accompanies the Seventh Army on a grueling overland journey from the northern city of Hissar to the southern city of Aren. The third involves Crokus, Apsalar, and Fiddler, three of the characters from Gardens of the Moon, who have come east to try and get Apsalar home to her father. The fourth involves another refugee, Kalam, who has come east for decidedly different means.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Deadhouse Gates is, essentially, a tale of journeys. In epic fantasy series (and this one is truly epic in scope; the first three books alone total close to twenty-five hundred pages), the book of journeys, or the book of transitions, is often the weakest in the series (cf. Martin's A Clash of Kings, or King's The Waste Lands). Erikson, on the other hand, has crafted an amazing piece of work in Deadhouse Gates, investing the journeys, and the underlying transitions, with more than enough action and intelligence to keep the reader going, while still getting all the boring stuff out of the way under the surface. Everyone gets where they're going, all the plot threads are eventually sewn up (except those left as obvious hooks into the remainder of the series), all the details that one almost expects, these days, to see disappear into the dust of all these riders on their journeys come to satisfying conclusions. Erikson's eye for detail is truly astounding in some cases.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;One word of warning, though, in case you hadn't yet realized it after reading Gardens of the Moon. Erikson is just as hard on his main characters as is George R. R. Martin; some of the characters in this novel have a decidedly Janet Leigh air about them, but Erikson never once, in the hundreds of pages before he dispatches them, lets you know which ones they'll be, and their deaths often come with the same surprise (and surprisingly-felt sorrow) as the surprising death at the climax of A Game of Thrones (the identity of the victim of which I shall not reveal here to spare those handful of you who have not yet started that equally brilliant series).&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;An incredible piece of work, quite likely to find its way onto my Best-I-Read list for 2005. **** Â½&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Deadhouse-Gates-Tale-Malazan-Fallen/product-reviews/0765348799/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#RCIZ26FC2TUG3">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>

               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Fantasy at its best
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               A Kid's Review
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on February 26, 2001
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3QBZOAJ1204SK">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Paperback
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               If you're looking for a low-calorie dish of light fantasy, this ain't it. If you're looking for a nine-course riot of taste and texture, exotically spiced to make your eyes water, your heart pump faster and your brain do cartwheels inside your cranium, I know a great little Thai place downtown. Or, if you want something analogous to that in your reading, stop at the 'E's and pick up the latest from Steven Erikson.
               <br/>
               Like 'Gardens of the Moon', and indeed like the whole concept for the 10-volume Malazan series, Deadhouse Gates is an ambitious work that is sometimes in danger of over-reaching itself. But if you can buckle down for the ride, it sure is a frightening one.
               <br/>
               I don't know what to say, this is the greatest fantasy book I have read ever for a few years. The book starts of a bit slow and your not sure what is happening, as you read on you start to understand what is happening. The book is not just focused on one Character, but serveral. Like most fantasy goods, its good vs Evil, this is different, Good guys do bad things and bad guys do good things and sometimes things that look good are actually bad. So you don't know who's side you are on. In GOTM (Gardens of the Moon), people were say there was not enough history background info, but you find out much in this book, and I'm sure we will find out much more in the future books. The second half of the book, starts to set off fireworks, fast pace action, this book makes you think. Kalam, Crokus, Apsalar, and Fiddler are back, and they got business to sort out.
               <br/>
               The characters have totally different personalities, and aims. Also we see alot of Parans younger sister Fesilin, and hear much about his older sister.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot; The book is building up to a massive climax for the seven cities, where each side will later have to gamble, take risks, and have the nerves to do what they need to. Also you learn much more about Shadowthrone's and co, history. And the new characters are wicked. S.E really knows all about writing battles, and descripbing exactly what is happening. You'll know what I mean when you read about the Chain Of Dogs.&lt;br /&gt;It is quite challenging to read, but when you have finished it, you'll be demanding more. I just can't wait for the next one to come out when they return to Genabackis, coming out in Sep 2001 called 'Memories of Ice'.&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Deadhouse-Gates-Tale-Malazan-Fallen/product-reviews/0765348799/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R3QBZOAJ1204SK">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3QBZOAJ1204SK/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0593046226&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="0">
             Comment
            </a>

             <div class="a-box a-alert-inline a-alert-inline-error a-hidden cr-vote-error">

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3SMG1LK5XTUTI">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              29 of 34 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3SMG1LK5XTUTI/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765348799&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="4.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-4">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3SMG1LK5XTUTI/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765348799&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Powerful and imaginative
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/AP5NXS66INNOB/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                newyork2dallas
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on February 10, 2005
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3SMG1LK5XTUTI">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               It is actually a tribute to Steven Erikson's writing that this book is so hard to plow through. This is because his vivid descriptions of the central heroic event of the novel -- a retreat from a conquering army that is akin to Mao's Long March (although it's the potential "good guys" who are retreating, not a future oppressor of 1/2 of Asia) -- is so realistic. The retreating army's despair, desperation, resignation, determination, heroism, intelligence, brutality (and those of its enemy) are palpable to the point that it is difficult to read of the dire straits of the heroes.  The second main plot thread is nearly as dreary as the youngest sister of Gardens of the Moon (book 1) hero Ganoes Paran is captured and sentenced to imprisonment in a mining camp.  Her transformation from happy noble youth to defeated young woman to embodying a cultural icon conveys numerous tribulations, and few triumphs.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Deadhouse Gates also has three or more other major story threads that are largely separate from Gardens of the Moon (book 1 of the Malazan Empire series), and is essentially a stand-alone novel. Nonetheless, Deadhouse Gates fits squarely within the overarching narrative that connects all the books in the series (and which becomes more apparent in Memories of Ice, book 3 of the series). It contains the story elements that have launched Erikson's career -- gritty stories of heroism and villainy, vivid action, intriguing cultural elements, a long and rich history preceding the story at hand, unquestioned originality (especially in comparison to 95% of the fantasy fiction available) and the feel that the world he created is starting toward a gargantuan eruption with innumerable initial tremors.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Note that the whole Malazan Cycle is projected at 10 books total, but Erikson writes relatively fast (he's slowed to about 3 Malazan books per every four years, which is pretty good considering the size of the books and the side projects he is working on). Nonetheless, they're worth the time and effort to procure and read.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Highly Recommended.&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Deadhouse-Gates-Tale-Malazan-Fallen/product-reviews/0765348799/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R3SMG1LK5XTUTI">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3SMG1LK5XTUTI/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765310023&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="0">
             Comment
            </a>

        <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
         Product Images from Customers
        </h3>
        <div class="a-section a-spacing-small">
         <div class="a-fixed-right-grid">
          <div class="a-fixed-right-grid-inner" style="padding-right:100px">
           <div class="a-text-center a-fixed-right-grid-col image-right-padding" style="float:left;">
            <a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/customer-media/product-gallery/0765348799/ref=cm_cr_dp_cust_img_see_all_img0">
             <img alt="" height="100" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/ciu/54/ac/afe4228348a07f5563bce010.L.jpg" width="68"/>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a-fixed-right-grid-col a-col-right" style="width:100px;margin-right:-100px;float:left;">

    <script type="text/javascript">
     if(typeof setCSMReq == 'function') {
        setCSMReq('cf');
  }else {
     if(typeof uet == 'function') {
        uet('cf');
     }
     amznJQ.completedStage('amznJQ.criticalFeature');
  }
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
     P.when("cf").execute(function(){

               P.load.js('http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/udpFeatureJavascript/udpFeatureJavascript-2925159769._V1_.js');
               
});

amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
  amznJQ.available('search-js-jq', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('amazonShoveler', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('simsJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('cmuAnnotations', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('externalJS.tagging', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('amzn-ratings-bar', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('accessoriesJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('priceformatterJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('CustomerPopover', function(){});

if (!window.DPClientLogger) {
    window.DPClientLogger = {};
}

window.DPClientLogger.ImpressionLogger = function( program_group, feature, forceUpload, controlledLogging) {
    var self = this,
    data = {};
    var isBooksUdploggingDisabled = false;
    var enableNewCSMs = false;
    var newCSMs = ["ma-books-image-ftb-shown","ma-books-image-listen-shown","ma-img-gallery-opened","ma-img-gallery-zoom","ma-img-gallery-thumb"];

    enableNewCSMs = true;

    self.logImpression = function(key) {
      if(!(isBooksUdploggingDisabled && controlledLogging !== undefined && controlledLogging)){
          var isNewCSM = self.isKeyNewCSM(key);
          if(!isNewCSM || ( isNewCSM && enableNewCSMs)){
              data[key]=1;
              setTimeout( self.upload, 2000 ); // upload client side metrics after 2secs of recording it.
          }
      } 
    };

    self.isKeyNewCSM = function(key){
      var isNewCSM = false;
      jQuery.each(newCSMs, function(index,csm){
          if(csm == key){
              isNewCSM = true;
          }
      });
      return isNewCSM;
    };

    self.upload = function() {
      var t = [];
      jQuery.each(data, function(k,v){ t.push(k); });
      data = {};
      if(t.length > 0){
        var protocol = location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://" : "http://",
            url = protocol + ue.furl + "/1/action-impressions/1/OP/" + program_group + "/action/" + feature + ":" + t.join() + "?marketplaceId=" + ue.mid + "&requestId=" + ue.rid + "&session=" + ue.sid + "&_=" + (new Date()).getTime();
        (new Image()).src = url;
      }
    };

    if(forceUpload) {
        jQuery(window).unload(function() { self.upload();});
    }
};
amznJQ.onReady("jQuery", function(){
  amznJQ.declareAvailable("DPClientLogger");
});

if (typeof(loadState) != "undefined" && !loadState) {

(function(){
    if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function'){
        if((typeof(loadState) != "undefined") && !loadState){
            if(jQuery.browser.msie){
                ue.tag("msie-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.mozilla) {
                ue.tag("mozilla-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.safari) {
                ue.tag("safari-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.webkit) {
                ue.tag("webkit-img-not-loaded");
            } else {
                ue.tag("unknown-img-not-loaded");
            }
        }
    }
})();
}

});
    </script>

               <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/gfix/imageCorrection.html/ref=gfix-hmd-image?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0765348799&amp;merchantID=ATVPDKIKX0DER&amp;storeID=books">
                give feedback on images
               </a>
              </b>
              , or
              <b>
               <a href="#" id="ns_07DC64HRAHHB9JHCQHYS_460_1_hmd_pricing_feedback_trigger_hmd">
                tell us about a lower price
               </a>
              </b>
              ?
              <script type="text/javascript">
               amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    jQuery("#ns_07DC64HRAHHB9JHCQHYS_460_1_hmd_pricing_feedback_trigger_hmd").amazonPopoverTrigger({
        title: "Tell Us About a Lower Price",
        destination: "/gp/pdp/pf/pricingFeedbackForm.html/ref=_pfhmd?ie=UTF8&ASIN=0765348799&PREFIX=ns_07DC64HRAHHB9JHCQHYS_460_2_&from=hmd&originalURI=%2Fgp%2Fproduct%2F0765348799&storeID=books",
        showOnHover: false,
        draggable: true
    });
});
              </script>
             </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
             <td>
              <img border="0" height="9" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/icons/orange-arrow._V192570247_.gif" style="vertical-align:middle !important" width="5"/>
              If you are a seller for this product and want to change product data, click
              <b>
               <a href="https://sellercentral.amazon.com/gp/contact-us/contact-amazon-form.html/ref=asin_feedback_box?asin_or_isbn=0765348799&amp;categoryID=20008&amp;typeID=20023" target="_blank">
                here
               </a>
              </b>
              (you may have to sign in with your seller id).
             </td>
            </tr>
           </table>
          </span>
         </td>
        </tr>
       </table>
      </div>
     </div>
