    <div id="rhf" style="clear:both">
     <table align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="rhf_table">
      <tr>
       <td class="rhf-box-corner-sprite rhf-box-tl" width="15">
       </td>
       <td class="rhf-box-corner-sprite rhf-box-tc">
        <div class="rhf_header">
         <span id="rhfMainHeading">
          Your Recently Viewed Items and Featured Recommendations
         </span>
        </div>
       </td>
       <td class="rhf-box-corner-sprite rhf-box-tr" width="15">
       </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
       <td class="rhf-box-sides-sprite rhf-box-l" width="15">
       </td>
       <td>
        <div id="rhf_container" style="display:none;">
         <div class="rhf_loading_outer">
          <table class="rhf_loading_middle">
           <tr>
            <td class="rhf_loading_inner">
             <img src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/ui/loadIndicators/loadIndicator-large._V192195480_.gif"/>
            </td>
           </tr>
          </table>
         </div>
         <script type="text/JavaScript">
          window.rhf_use_AUI = 1 && typeof P === 'object' && P.AUI_BUILD_DATE;


window.rhf_use_AUI_lib = typeof P === 'object' && P.AUI_BUILD_DATE;

if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
    

amznJQ.addLogical('p13nlogger', ['http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/p13nlogger/p13nlogger-3861958816._V1_.js']);
amznJQ.addLogical('callOnVisible', ['http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/callOnVisible/callOnVisible-66186444._V1_.js']);

var rhfP13NLogger = function(rhfWaitTime, success) {
    amznJQ.onReady('callOnVisible', function () {        
        var rhfContainer = jQuery("#rhf_container");
        var action = success ? 'view' : 'ajax_failure';
       	if (typeof rhfContainer.callOnVisible == 'function') {
	    rhfContainer.callOnVisible(function () {
                var rhfLog = function(eventData) {
		    amznJQ.onReady('p13nlogger', function() {
			var commonData = {
		            channel: 'recommendations',
			    widget: 'pd_rhf',
			    featureElement: rhfContainer,
			    requestInfoElement: '#rhf0RequestInfo'
			};
			p13n.logEvent(jQuery.extend({}, commonData, eventData));
		    });
		};
		rhfLog({
		   action: action,
		   page: 1,
		   eventtime: rhfWaitTime,
		   meta: {'isRHFLoaded': success}
		});
	    }, 0); 
        }
    });
};

var rhfRVIP13NLogger = function() {
        var rviContainer = jQuery("#horizontal-list");
        var shvlContainer = jQuery('#rhf_upsell_div');
        var isEventComplete = function() {
            return shvlContainer.find('.rhf_loading_outer').size() == 0;
        };
        var rviLog = function(eventData) {
            amznJQ.onReady('p13nlogger', function() {
               var commonData = {
                   channel: 'recommendations',
                   widget: 'pd_rhf',
                   isEventComplete: isEventComplete,
                   featureElement: shvlContainer,
                   requestInfoElement: '#rhf0RequestInfo'
               };
              p13n.logAsyncEvent(jQuery.extend({}, commonData, eventData));
            });
        };
        rviContainer.find('.rhf-RVIs').click(function() {
            rviLog({
                action: 'rvi_click',
                page: 1
            });
        });
        rviContainer.find('.clearSelection').click(function() {
            rviLog({
                action: 'clear_click',
                page: 1 
            }); 
        });
};

}

var rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction = function($) { (function($) {

    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading = false;
    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded = false;
    window.RECS_rhfInView = false;
    window.RECS_rhfMetrics = {};
    
    var rhfWaitTime = 0;

    $("#rhf_container").show();
    var rhfShvlEventHandler = function () {
        if (   ! window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded
            && ! window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading
            && $('#rhf_container').size() > 0 ) {
            var yPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
            var rhfElementFound = $('#rhfMainHeading').size();
            var rhfPosition = $('#rhfMainHeading').offset().top;

            if (/webkit.*mobile/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                rhfPosition -= $(window).scrollTop();
            }

            if (rhfElementFound && ( rhfPosition - yPosition < 400 )) {
                window.RECS_rhfMetrics["start"] = (new Date()).getTime();
                window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading = true;
                var handleSuccess = function (html) {
                    $("#rhf_container").html(html);
                    $("#rhf0Shvl").trigger("render-shoveler");
                    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded = true;
                    window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] = (new Date()).getTime();
                    if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
                        rhfWaitTime = window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] - window.RECS_rhfMetrics["inView"];
		        rhfP13NLogger(rhfWaitTime, true);
                        rhfRVIP13NLogger();
                    }
                };
                var handleError = function () {
                    $("#rhf_container").hide();
                    $("#rhf_error").show();
                    window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] = "error";
                    if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
                        rhfP13NLogger(rhfWaitTime, false);
                    }
                };
                var ajaxURL = '/gp/history/external/full-rhf-rec-handler.html';
                var ajaxArgs = {
                    type: "POST",
                    timeout: 10000,
                    data: {
                        shovelerName    : 'rhf0',
                        key             : 'rhf',
                        numToPreload    : '8',
                        isGateway       : 0,
                        refTag          : 'pd_rhf_dp',
                        parentSession   : '183-6149523-2214366',
                        relatedRequestId: '07DC64HRAHHB9JHCQHYS',
                        excludeASIN     : '0765348799',
                        renderPopover   : 0,
                        forceSprites    : 1,
                        currentPageType : 'Detail',
                        currentSubPageType : 'Glance',
                        weblabTriggers  : "",
                        // We'll pretend that AUI is disabled everywhere until all AUI carousel bugs are fixed.
                        isAUI           : window.rhf_use_AUI ? 1 : 0
                    },
                    dataType: "json",
                    success: function (data, status) {
                        if (typeof(data) === 'object' && data.success && data.html) {
                            handleSuccess(data.html);
                            if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
                                P.when("jQuery", "a-carousel-framework").execute(function(jQuery, framework){
                                  jQuery("#rhf_upsell_div .a-carousel-viewport").addClass("a-carousel-slide");
                                  framework.createAll();
                                });
                            }
                        } else {
                            handleError();
                        }
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, status) {
                        handleError();
                    }
                };
                if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
                    P.when("A").execute(function (A) {
                        A.$.ajax(ajaxURL, ajaxArgs);
                    });
                } else {
                    ajaxArgs['url'] = ajaxURL;
                    $.ajax(ajaxArgs);
                }
            }
        }
    };
    var getDuplicateASINList = function() {
        var cartRecsASINList;
        if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
            var cartCarouselParams = $("div[data-p13n-widget = 'pd_cart_recs']").attr("data-a-carousel-options");
            if (cartCarouselParams) {     
                cartRecsASINList = JSON.parse(cartCarouselParams).ajax.id_list;
                //Get first 10 of the List, will get all of them if less than 10
                return JSON.stringify(cartRecsASINList.slice(0, 10));
            }
        } else if (window.RECS_cartRecs_ASINList) {
            cartRecsASINList = window.RECS_cartRecs_ASINList;
            return JSON.stringify(cartRecsASINList.slice(0, 10));
        }
        return cartRecsASINList;
    };
    var rhfInView = function() {
        if (!window.RECS_rhfInView && $('#rhf_container').size() > 0) {
            var yPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
            var rhfElementFound = ($('#rhfMainHeading').size() > 0);
            var rhfPosition = $('#rhfMainHeading').offset().top;
            if (/webkit.*mobile/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                rhfPosition -= $(window).scrollTop();
            }
            if (rhfElementFound && ( rhfPosition - yPosition < 0 )) {
                window.RECS_rhfInView = true;
                window.RECS_rhfMetrics["inView"] = (new Date()).getTime();
            }
        }
    };
    window.rhfYBHTurnOn = function () {
            $.ajax({
                  url: '/gp/history/external/full-rhf-ybh-on-handler.html',
                  type: "POST",
                  timeout: 2000,
                  data: {
                         parentSession    : '183-6149523-2214366'
                  },
                  dataType: "text",
                  success: function (data, status) {
                               $("#yourBrowsingHistoryOnText").find('p').html("You don't have any recently viewed Items.");
                               $("#rhf-ybh-turn-on-link").hide();
                  }
            });
    };
    $(document).ready(rhfShvlEventHandler);
    $(document).ready(rhfInView);
    $(window).scroll(rhfShvlEventHandler);
    $(window).scroll(rhfInView);
})($); }
if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
    //Register a component
    P.when('jQuery', 'ready').register('rhf-bootstrapper', function($){
       return {
            bootstrap : function(){
                return rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction($);
            }
       };
    });
    //Use that component after it initializes
    P.when('rhf-bootstrapper').execute(function(rhfBootstrapper){
        rhfBootstrapper.bootstrap();
    });
} else {
    amznJQ.onReady(
        'jQuery',
        function () {
            rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction(jQuery);
        }
     );
}
         </script>
        </div>
        <noscript>
         <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-top: 10px" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
           <td valign="top">
            <div class="rhfHistoryWrapper">
             <p>
              After viewing product detail pages, look here to find an easy way to navigate back to pages you are interested in.
             </p>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div style="padding:10px 10px 0 10px; text-align:left;">
             <b>
              <span style="color: rgb(204, 153, 0); font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px;">
               â€º
              </span>
              <a href="/gp/yourstore/pym/ref=pd_pyml_rhf">
               View and Edit Your Browsing History
              </a>
             </b>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </noscript>
        <div id="rhf_error" style="display:none;">
         <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-top: 10px" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
           <td valign="top">
            <div class="rhfHistoryWrapper">
             <p>
              After viewing product detail pages, look here to find an easy way to navigate back to pages you are interested in.
             </p>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div style="padding:10px 10px 0 10px; text-align:left;">
             <b>
              <span style="color: rgb(204, 153, 0); font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px;">
               â€º
              </span>
              <a href="/gp/yourstore/pym/ref=pd_pyml_rhf">
               View and Edit Your Browsing History
              </a>
             </b>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>

/* customer-reviews-read-more */


P.when("A").execute(function(A) {
    var jQuery         = A.$;
    function showFullReview(event) {
        event.$event.preventDefault();
        event.$target.hide();
    
        var parent = event.$target.parent().parent();
        var fullText = parent.find(".MHRHead").html() +  event.data.rest;
        var pxInitialSize = parent.height();
          
        parent.html(fullText);
        var pxTargetSize = parent.height();
        parent.height(pxInitialSize);
        parent.animate({height: pxTargetSize + 'px'}, 400, function(){parent.css("height", "auto")});
    }
    
    A.declarative("columnbalancing-showfullreview", ["click"], showFullReview);
});


/* customer-reviews */



  
P.when("A").execute(function(A) {
   
   function vote(event) {
     var root = A.$(event.data.rootComponentId);
     var target = event.$target;
     root.find(".cr-vote-buttons").addClass("a-hidden");
     root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").removeClass("a-hidden");
       
     A.get(target.attr("href") + "&type=json&_=" + (new Date()).getTime(),
     {
	   dataType: 'json',
	   ajaxTimeout: 10000,
	   success: function(data, textStatus){ 
         success(data, root, target);
       },
	   error: function(XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown){
         error(root, target);
       }
	 });
     event.$event.preventDefault();

   }

   function isNoButton(target) {       
     return target.closest(".noButton").length > 0;
   }

   function success(data, root, target) {
       if (data.redirect == 1) {
	   window.location.href = target.attr("href");
       } else if (data.error == 1) {
	   error(root, target);
       } else {
	   if (isNoButton(target)) {
               root.find(".cr-vote-inapp").removeClass("a-hidden");
	       
	   }
	   root.find(".cr-vote-success").removeClass("a-hidden");	   
	   root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").addClass("a-hidden");
       }
   }

   function error(root, target) {
       root.find(".cr-vote-error").removeClass("a-hidden");	   
       root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").addClass("a-hidden");
   }

   A.declarative("cr-vote", ["click"], vote);
});

P.when("A").register("#quotesTable", function(A){
  var jQuery   = A.$;

  var reviewContainer = jQuery("#reviewContainer");   
  var revMHLContainer = jQuery("#revMHLContainer");
  balanceQuotes();

  function balanceQuotes() {
    var mhlWidth = revMHLContainer.width();
    if (785 > mhlWidth) {
      reviewTopContainer.prependTo(reviewContainer);
    } else {
      reviewTopContainer.prependTo(revMHLContainer);
    }
  }
   
  jQuery(window).resize(balanceQuotes);
});

$SearchJS.when('jQuery').run('jQuery-unload-patch', function(jQuery) {
  if (jQuery.fn.jquery == '1.2.6') {
    var windowUnloadHandlers = jQuery.data(window, "events").unload;
    for (var origUnloadUnbinder in windowUnloadHandlers) {
      break;
    }
    jQuery(window).unbind('unload', windowUnloadHandlers[origUnloadUnbinder]).unload(function(){
      if (jQuery.browser.msie) {
        // taken from http://bugs.jquery.com/attachment/ticket/2698/unload.js
        var elems = document.getElementsByTagName('*'),
            pos = elems.length + 1, // +1 for the document
            dummy = {};

        jQuery.data( dummy );
        for( var expando in dummy );

        while( pos-- ){
          var elem = elems[ pos ] || document, //add the document
          id = elem[expando];

          if( id && jQuery.cache[id] && jQuery.cache[id].events )
            jQuery.event.remove( elem );
        }
      }
    });
  }
});

  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions & special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];
    if(b&&--b.c==0){
        if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a);};
        if(b.e){amznJQ.completedStage(b.e);};
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){P.register(b.p);};
    }
}

    marker=marker.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c == 0){
        if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function') {
            ue.tag(customtag);
        }
    }
}

var dealNotifier = null;

var ldNotifierCallback = function(auiJQ) {
  if (window.navbar != null && window.navbar.getLightningDealsData != null &&
      typeof window.navbar.getLightningDealsData == 'function') { 

    var lightningDealsData = window.navbar.getLightningDealsData();
    var url = '/gp/deal/ajax/getNotifierData.html' +
              '?customerID='  + lightningDealsData.customerID +
              '&sessionID='   + '183-6149523-2214366' +
              '&hasATCAsins=' + ((lightningDealsData.activeItems.length>0)?1:0);
                
    var dealResourcesCallback = function(result) {
        if (!window.gbResources) {
            window.gbResources = new GBResources();
        }
        gbResources.registerFromJSON(result.resourceData);

            thresholdOffset : '10',
            wlexp           : true,
            isAuiBased      : 1,
            sessionId       : '183-6149523-2214366',
            now             : '1398320285',
            popupSkin       : '  <div style="width: 335px;" class="lightningDealsPopupAlert">   <div style="position: relative;">     <table style="border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%;">       <tr>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png);         success: function(result) {
                  if (typeof(amznJQ) === "object") {
                    amznJQ.onReady('dealResources', function() {
                        dealResourcesCallback(result);
                    });

                 <input id="ftSelectAsin" type="hidden" value="0765348780"/>

                  <script type="text/javascript">
                   FT_showAndInCountdown = false;
FT_HourString = "hr";
FT_HoursString = "hrs";
FT_MinuteString = "min";
FT_MinutesString = "mins";
FT_AndString = "and";

function getElementsByClassNameCustom(className) {
    var selectedElements = [];
    if (document.getElementsByClassName) {
        selectedElements = document.getElementsByClassName(className);
    } else if (document.querySelectorAll) {
        selectedElements = document.querySelectorAll("." + className);
    }
    return selectedElements;
}

var FT_CurrentDisplayMin;
var clientServerTimeDrift;
var firstTimeUpdate = true;

var countdownElements = getElementsByClassNameCustom("ftCountdownClass");
if (countdownElements.length < 1) {
    countdownElements.push(document.getElementById("ftCountdown"));
}

function getTimeRemainingString( hours, minutes )
{
  var hourString   =  ( hours == 1 ? FT_HourString : FT_HoursString );
  var minuteString =  ( minutes  == 1 ? FT_MinuteString : FT_MinutesString );
  if (hours == 0) {
    return minutes + " " + minuteString;
  }
  if (minutes == 0) {
    return hours + " " + hourString;
  }
  if (FT_showAndInCountdown) {
    return hours + " " + hourString + " " + FT_AndString + " " + minutes + " " + minuteString;
  } else {
    return hours + " " + hourString + " " + minutes + " " + minuteString;
  }
}
function FT_displayCountdown(forceUpdate)
{
  var FT_remainSeconds = FT_givenSeconds - FT_actualSeconds;
  if (FT_remainSeconds < 1 && document.getElementById("fast-track")) {
    document.getElementById("fast-track").style.display = "none";
  }
  var FT_secondsPerDay = 24 * 60 * 60;
  var FT_daysLong = FT_remainSeconds / FT_secondsPerDay;
  var FT_days = Math.floor(FT_daysLong);
  var FT_hoursLong = (FT_daysLong - FT_days) * 24;
  var FT_hours = Math.floor(FT_hoursLong);
  var FT_minsLong = (FT_hoursLong - FT_hours) * 60;
  var FT_mins = Math.floor(FT_minsLong);
  var FT_secsLong = (FT_minsLong - FT_mins) * 60;
  var FT_secs = Math.floor(FT_secsLong);
  if (FT_days > 0) {
    FT_hours = (FT_days * 24) + FT_hours;
  }
  setTimeout("FT_getTime()", 1000);
  var ftCountdown = getTimeRemainingString( FT_hours, FT_mins );
  if (countdownElements.length) {
    if (FT_CurrentDisplayMin != FT_mins || forceUpdate || firstTimeUpdate) {
      var i = 0, countdownElement;
      while (countdownElement = countdownElements[i++]) {
        countdownElement.innerHTML = ftCountdown;
      }
      FT_CurrentDisplayMin = FT_mins;
      firstTimeUpdate = false;
    }
  }
}

function FT_getCountdown(secondsLeft)
{
  var FT_currentTime = new Date();
  var FT_currentHours = FT_currentTime.getHours();
  var FT_currentMins = FT_currentTime.getMinutes();
  var FT_currentSecs = FT_currentTime.getSeconds();
  FT_givenSeconds = FT_currentHours * 3600 + FT_currentMins * 60 + FT_currentSecs;
  FT_givenSeconds += secondsLeft;
  FT_getTime();
}
function FT_getTime()
{
  var FT_newCurrentTime = new Date();
  var FT_actualHours = FT_newCurrentTime.getHours();
  var FT_actualMins = FT_newCurrentTime.getMinutes();
  var FT_actualSecs = FT_newCurrentTime.getSeconds();
  FT_actualSeconds = FT_actualHours * 3600 + FT_actualMins * 60 + FT_actualSecs;
  FT_displayCountdown();
}
                  </script>
                  <script type="text/javascript">
                   FT_getCountdown(60116);
                  </script>
                 </div>
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  P.when("A", "jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {
            $("#quantity").live("change", function (event) {
                if (event.updateFTOnQuantityChange) {
                    return;
                }
                event.updateFTOnQuantityChange = 1;

                var quantity = $(this).val();
                var asin = $("#ftSelectAsin").val();
                var merchantId = $("#ftSelectMerchant").val();

                if (!asin || !merchantId) {
                    return;
                }

                var params = [];
                params.push("asin=" + asin);
                params.push("quantity=" + quantity);
                params.push("merchantId=" + merchantId);

                $.ajax({
                    type: "POST",
                    url: "/gp/product/features/dp-fast-track/udp-ajax-handler/get-quantity-update-message.html?ie=UTF8",
                    contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
                    data: params.join('&'),
                    dataType: "html",
                    success: function(objResponse) {
                        if (objResponse != null && objResponse != "") {
                            $("#fast-track-message").replaceWith(objResponse);
                        }
                    }
                });
                return;
            });
        });
                 </script>
                </div>
               </div>

                 Comment:
                </strong>
                The cover shows heavy wear. The cover has curled corners. The spine is creased and warped. The pages show normal wear and tear. Text only, no supplement included. Item ships secure with Fulfillment By Amazon, Prime customers get 2nd day at no charge!
               </div>
              </div>
              <div data-close="Close" data-title="What is Fulfillment by Amazon?" id="SSOFpopoverLink_ubb_content" style="display:none;">
               <p>
                Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) is a service we offer sellers that lets them store their products in Amazon's fulfillment centers, and we directly pack, ship, and provide customer service for these products. Something we hope you'll especially enjoy:
                <em>
                 FBA items qualify for FREE Shipping and
                 <i class="a-icon a-icon-prime">
                 </i>
                 .
                </em>
               </p>
               <p>
                If you're a seller, Fulfillment by Amazon can help you increase your sales. We invite you to
                <a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/seller/fba/fulfillment-by-amazon.html?ie=UTF8&amp;ld=AZFBADP&amp;ref=dp_fba_pop" target="_blank">
                 learn more about Fulfillment by Amazon
                </a>
                .
               </p>
              </div>
              <script type="text/javascript">
               amznJQ.onReady("popover", function() {
  var fbaPopover = jQuery("#SSOFpopoverLink_ubb_content");
  jQuery("#SSOFpopoverLink_ubb").amazonPopoverTrigger({
    closeText: fbaPopover.attr("data-close"),
    location: "bottom",
    localContent: "#SSOFpopoverLink_ubb_content",
    showOnHover: window.touchDeviceDetected,
    title: fbaPopover.attr("data-title"),
    width: 430,
    onShow: function() { 
     jQuery(document).click(); 
    }
  });
});
              </script>
              <div class="a-button-stack">
               <span class="a-button a-spacing-small a-button-primary a-button-icon" id="submit.add-to-cart-ubb">
                <span class="a-button-inner">
                 <i class="a-icon a-icon-cart">
                 </i>
                 <input class="a-button-input" data-hover="Select &lt;b&gt;__dims__&lt;/b&gt; from the left&lt;br&gt; to add to Shopping Cart" id="add-to-cart-button-ubb" name="submit.add-to-cart-ubb" title="Add to Shopping Cart" type="submit" value="Add to Cart"/>
                 <span class="a-button-text">
                  Add to Cart
                 </span>
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-text-center">
               <div class="a-row a-spacing-none">
                <div class="a-section a-spacing-none" id="oneClickSignInUBB">
                 <div class="a-divider a-divider-break a-spacing-micro">
                  <h5>
                   <a href="/gp/product/utility/edit-one-click-pref.html?ie=UTF8&amp;query=selectObb%3dused&amp;returnPath=%2fgp%2fproduct%2f0765348780">
                    Sign in to turn on 1-click ordering
                   </a>
                  </h5>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <script data-a-state='{"key":"wishlistDPState"}' type="a-state">
         {"streaming":"1","createWidth":"400","createHeight":"auto","addHeight":"700","action":"add","addUrl":"/gp/registry/huc/add-item-ajax.html?ie=UTF8","createUrl":"/gp/registry/create/create-pop.html?ie=UTF8","addWidth":"900","isFirstCreate":false,"addHeader":"Add to Wish List","createHeader":"Create a Wish List"}
        </script>
        <div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-addCreateToWishlist">
         <div class="a-section" id="popover-spinner">
          <div class="a-section a-padding-large a-popover-loading">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden wlAddCreatePop" id="WLHUC_result">
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden wlAddCreatePop" id="WLNEW_main">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="a-button-stack" id="wishlistButtonStack">
         <script data-a-state='{"key":"atwl"}' type="a-state">
          {"dropDownHtml":"","asin":"0765348780","wishlistButtonId":"add-to-wishlist-button","maxAjaxFailureCount":"3","sortMethod":"default","wishlistButtonSubmitId":"add-to-wishlist-button-submit"}
         </script>
         <div class="a-button-group a-declarative a-spacing-none" data-action="a-button-group" data-hover="&lt;!-- If PartialItemStateWeblab is true then, showing different Add-to-wish-list tool-tip message which is consistent with Add-to-Cart tool tip message.  --&gt;
    
        
        
            To Add to Wish List, choose from options to the left" id="add-to-wishlist-button-group">
          <span class="a-button a-spacing-none" id="wishListMainButton">
           <span class="a-button-inner">
            <input class="a-button-input a-text-left" data-hover="&lt;!-- If PartialItemStateWeblab is true then, showing different Add-to-wish-list tool-tip message which is consistent with Add-to-Cart tool tip message.  --&gt;
    
        
        
            To Add to Wish List, choose from options to the left" id="add-to-wishlist-button-submit" name="submit.add-to-registry.wishlist" title="Add to Wish List" type="submit" value="Add to Wish List"/>
            <span class="a-button-text">
             Add to Wish List
             <span class="a-declarative" data-a-modal='{"cache":"false","name":"addCreateToWishlist","width":"900","header":"Add to Wish List"}' data-action="a-modal" id="add-wishlist-declarative">
             </span>
            </span>
           </span>
          </span>
          <span class="a-button a-button-dropdown a-spacing-none wishlist-dropdown-button" id="wishListDropDown">
           <span class="a-button-inner">
            <i class="a-icon a-icon-dropdown">
            </i>
            <input class="a-button-input a-text-left" data-hover="&lt;!-- If PartialItemStateWeblab is true then, showing different Add-to-wish-list tool-tip message which is consistent with Add-to-Cart tool tip message.  --&gt;
    
        
        
            To Add to Wish List, choose from options to the left" data-type="wishlist" id="add-to-wishlist-button" name="submit.add-to-registry.wishlist" type="submit"/>
            <span class="a-button-text">
            </span>
           </span>
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden" id="atwl-dd-spinner-holder">
          <div class="a-row a-dropdown">
           <div class="a-section a-popover-wrapper">
            <div class="a-section a-text-center a-popover-inner">
             <div class="a-box a-popover-loading">
              <div class="a-box-inner">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden" id="atwl-dd-error-holder">
          <div class="a-section a-dropdown">
           <div class="a-section a-popover-wrapper">
            <div class="a-section a-spacing-base a-padding-base a-text-left a-popover-inner">
             <h3 class="a-color-error">
              Sorry, there was a problem.
             </h3>
             <span>
              There was an error retrieving your Wish Lists. Please try again.
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden" id="atwl-dd-unavail-holder">
          <div class="a-section a-dropdown">
           <div class="a-section a-popover-wrapper">
            <div class="a-section a-spacing-base a-padding-base a-text-left a-popover-inner">
             <h3 class="a-color-error">
              Sorry, there was a problem.
             </h3>
             <span>
              Wish List unavailable.
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="atfMarker" id="atfMarker_feature_div">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-html-atf-marker');};
      </script>
     </div>

        <div class="a-row" id="flipAndSampleAudio">

      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(true){
		audibleData = {
			'audioSampleSrc' : "http://samples.audible.com/bk/brll/004253/bk_brll_004253_sample.mp3",
		    'flashPlayerUrl' : "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/zeitgeist/mp3player/swf/zgMp3Player-1.0._V212274098_.swf"
		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,
	    'frontImageWidth' : 215,
	    'frontImageHeight' : 346,
	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.6213872832369942,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/817CteSzxqL.jpg","dimensions":[1400,2257],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/817CteSzxqL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});
      </script>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.criticalFeature", function() {
amznJQ.available("popover", function() {
    var acr = jQuery("#averageCustomerReviews");
    var dest = "/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?ref=" + acr.attr("data-ref") + 
               "&link=1&seeall=1&ASIN=" + acr.attr("data-asin");
    acr.find(".reviewCountTextLinkedHistogram").amazonPopoverTrigger({
        destination: dest,
        group: "reviewsPopover",
        hoverHideDelay:300,
        location:"bottom",
        locationAlign:"left",
        locationOffset:[-20,-2],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        onShow: function(popover) { 
            jQuery(document).click(); 
        }
    })
});
});

        </div>
        <div class="second-level" id="metabinding_row_top_1">
        </div>
        <div class="second-level" id="metabinding_row_bottom_1">
        </div>
        <div class="hr unselected-row">

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="bookDescription" id="bookDescription_feature_div">
      <script id="bookDesc_override_CSS" type="text/undefined">
       body { 
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.6em;
}
      </script>
      <noscript>
       <div>
        <div>
         The Malazan Empire simmers with discontent, bled dry by interminable warfare, bitter infighting and bloody confrontations. Even the imperial legions, long inured to the bloodshed, yearn for some respite. Yet Empress Laseen's rule remains absolute, enforced by her dread Claw assassins.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         For Sergeant Whiskeyjack and his squad of Bridgeburners, and for Tattersail, surviving cadre mage of the Second Legion, the aftermath of the siege of Pale should have been a time to mourn the many dead. But Darujhistan, last of the Free Cities of Genabackis, yet holds out. It is to this ancient citadel that Laseen turns her predatory gaze.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         However, it would appear that the Empire is not alone in this great game. Sinister, shadowbound forces are gathering as the gods themselves prepare to play their hand . . .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Conceived and written on a panoramic scale, Gardens of the Moon is epic fantasy of the highest order--an enthralling adventure by an outstanding new voice.
         <br/>
        </div>
       </div>
       <em>
       </em>
      </noscript>
      <div id="outer_postBodyPS" style="overflow: hidden; z-index: 1; height: 0px; display: block;">
       <div id="postBodyPS" style="overflow: hidden;">
        <div class="maxReadableWidth" id="bookDesc_iframe_wrapper">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="psPlaceHolder" style="height: 20px; display: none;">
       <div style="z-index: 3;">
        <a class="a-link-expander h2-expander">
         <i class="a-icon a-icon-expand" id="bdExpanderIcon">
         </i>
         <span id="bdSeeAllPrompt">
          Read more
         </span>
         <span id="bdSeeLessPrompt" style="display: none;">
          Read less
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3Cdiv%3EThe%20Malazan%20Empire%20simmers%20with%20discontent%2C%20bled%20dry%20by%20interminable%20warfare%2C%20bitter%20infighting%20and%20bloody%20confrontations.%20Even%20the%20imperial%20legions%2C%20long%20inured%20to%20the%20bloodshed%2C%20yearn%20for%20some%20respite.%20Yet%20Empress%20Laseen%27s%20rule%20remains%20absolute%2C%20enforced%20by%20her%20dread%20Claw%20assassins.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor%20Sergeant%20Whiskeyjack%20and%20his%20squad%20of%20Bridgeburners%2C%20and%20for%20Tattersail%2C%20surviving%20cadre%20mage%20of%20the%20Second%20Legion%2C%20the%20aftermath%20of%20the%20siege%20of%20Pale%20should%20have%20been%20a%20time%20to%20mourn%20the%20many%20dead.%20But%20Darujhistan%2C%20last%20of%20the%20Free%20Cities%20of%20Genabackis%2C%20yet%20holds%20out.%20It%20is%20to%20this%20ancient%20citadel%20that%20Laseen%20turns%20her%20predatory%20gaze.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHowever%2C%20it%20would%20appear%20that%20the%20Empire%20is%20not%20alone%20in%20this%20great%20game.%20Sinister%2C%20shadowbound%20forces%20are%20gathering%20as%20the%20gods%20themselves%20prepare%20to%20play%20their%20hand%20.%20.%20.%20%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EConceived%20and%20written%20on%20a%20panoramic%20scale%2C%20Gardens%20of%20the%20Moon%20is%20epic%20fantasy%20of%20the%20highest%20order--an%20enthralling%20adventure%20by%20an%20outstanding%20new%20voice.%3Cbr%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>
     </div>

     </div>

     </div>

    document.body.insertBefore(container, document.body.childNodes[0]);

    <script type="text/javascript">
     (function() {
        var h = document.head || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.documentElement;
        var s = document.createElement('script');
        s.async = 'async';
        s.src = 'http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/site-wide-js-1.6.4-beacon/site-wide-7771188665._V1_.js';
