        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="atfMarker" id="atfMarker_feature_div">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-html-atf-marker');};
      </script>
     </div>

     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="booksImageBlock" id="booksImageBlock_feature_div">

       <div id="sitbLogo">
        <img class="a-hidden litb-on-click" id="sitbLogoImg" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/sticker/sitb-sticker-v3-small._V341765094_.png"/>
       </div>
       <div class="a-row" id="imageBlock" style="height:386.6666666666667px;">
        <div class="a-row a-grid-center maintain-height" id="imageBlockContainer" style="height:346.6666666666667px;">
         <div class="a-column a-span12 a-text-center maintain-height a-span-last" id="main-image-container">
          <div class="maintain-height" id="img-wrapper">
           <div class="maintain-height litb-on-click" id="img-canvas" style="height:346.6666666666667px;">
            <img class="image-stretch-vertical frontImage" id="imgBlkFront" onload="this.onload='';setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-image-atf-marker');};setCSMReq('cf');" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51lPZw1WaOL._SY344_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg" style="max-width:225px; max-height:346px;"/>
            <img class="backImage a-hidden" id="imgBlkBack" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51WJwKaI-ML._SY344_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg" style="width:225px; height:346px;"/>

       <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-spacing-top-micro" id="imageBlockThumbs">
        <span class="a-declarative" data-a-modal='{"content":"&lt;div id=\"imgGalleryContent\" class=\"a-row\"&gt;\n  &lt;div class=\"a-column a-span8 a-text-center ig-main-image\"&gt;\n    &lt;div class=\"img-wrapper maintain-height\"&gt;\n      &lt;div id=\"igInner\" class=\"maintain-height zoomed-out\" style=\"height:200px;\"&gt;\n        &lt;img id=\"igImage\"&gt;\n        &lt;div class=\"a-popover-loading-wrapper a-text-center loading-bar\"&gt;\n          &lt;div class=\"a-box a-color-base-background a-popover-loading\"&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;\n        &lt;\/div&gt;\n      &lt;\/div&gt;\n    &lt;\/div&gt;\n  &lt;\/div&gt;\n  &lt;div class=\"a-column a-span4 ig-thumbs a-span-last\"&gt;\n  &lt;\/div&gt;\n&lt;\/div&gt;\n\n&lt;script type=\"text/javascript\"&gt;\nP.register(\"ImageGalleryMarkup\");\n&lt;\/script&gt;","header":"Images (2)"}' data-action="a-modal" id="imgThumbs">
         <div class="a-column a-span3 a-spacing-micro imageThumb thumb">
          <img src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51lPZw1WaOL._SX60_CR,0,0,60,60_.jpg"/>
         </div>
         <div class="a-column a-span3 a-spacing-micro imageThumb thumb">
          <img src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51WJwKaI-ML._SX60_CR,0,0,60,60_.jpg"/>

       <script type="text/javascript">
        P.when("A","jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {	
	function getWindowWidth() {
		return window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
	}
	function getWindowHeight() {
		return document.documentElement.clientHeight;
	}
	function setGalleryDimensions() {
		var widthRatio = 0.75,
		    heightDiff = 100,
		    $trigger = $("#imgThumbs"),
		    data = $trigger.data("a-modal");
		
		data.width = getWindowWidth() * widthRatio;
		data.height = getWindowHeight() - heightDiff;
		$trigger.data("a-modal", data);
		
	}	
	setGalleryDimensions();
	A.on("resize", setGalleryDimensions);
});
       </script>
       <div class="collections-collect-button">
       </div>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(true){
		audibleData = {
			'audioSampleSrc' : "http://samples.audible.com/bk/hach/001354/bk_hach_001354_sample.mp3",
		    'flashPlayerUrl' : "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/zeitgeist/mp3player/swf/zgMp3Player-1.0._V212274098_.swf"
		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,
	    'frontImageWidth' : 225,
	    'frontImageHeight' : 346,
	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.6502890173410405,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51lPZw1WaOL.jpg","dimensions":[324,500],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51lPZw1WaOL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"},{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81qxUera1LL.jpg","dimensions":[1657,2560],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81qxUera1LL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});
      </script>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="centerColumn" id="centerCol">
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="booksTitle" id="booksTitle">
      <div class="a-section a-spacing-none">
       <h1 class="a-size-large a-spacing-none" id="title">
        <span class="a-size-large" id="productTitle">
         Grain Brain: The Surprising Truth about Wheat, Carbs,  and Sugar--Your Brain's Silent Killers
        </span>
        <span class="a-size-medium a-color-secondary a-text-normal">
         Hardcover
        </span>
       </h1>
      </div>
      <div class="a-section a-spacing-micro bylineHidden feature" id="byline">
       by
       <span class="author notFaded" data-width="">
        <a class="a-link-normal" href="/s/ref=ntt_athr_dp_sr_1?ie=UTF8&amp;field-author=David+Perlmutter&amp;search-alias=books&amp;text=David+Perlmutter&amp;sort=relevancerank">
         David Perlmutter
        </a>
        <span class="contribution" spacing="none">
         <span class="a-color-secondary">
          (Author),
         </span>
        </span>
       </span>
       <span class="author notFaded" data-width="">
        <a class="a-link-normal" href="/s/ref=ntt_athr_dp_sr_2?ie=UTF8&amp;field-author=Kristin+Loberg&amp;search-alias=books&amp;text=Kristin+Loberg&amp;sort=relevancerank">
         Kristin Loberg
        </a>
        <span class="contribution" spacing="none">
         <span class="a-color-secondary">
          (Contributor)
         </span>
        </span>
       </span>
      </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="bookDescription" id="bookDescription_feature_div">
      <script id="bookDesc_override_CSS" type="text/undefined">
       body { 
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.6em;
}
      </script>
      <noscript>
       <div>
        <strong>
         A #1
         <em>
          New York Times
         </em>
         bestseller--t
        </strong>
        <strong>
         he devastating truth about the effects of wheat, sugar, and carbs on the brain, with a 4-week plan to achieve optimum health.
        </strong>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Renowned neurologist David Perlmutter, MD, blows the lid off a topic that's been buried in medical literature for far too long: carbs are destroying your brain. And not just unhealthy carbs, but even
        <em>
         healthy
        </em>
        ones like whole grains can cause dementia, ADHD, anxiety, chronic headaches, depression, and much more. Dr. Perlmutter explains what happens when the brain encounters common ingredients in your daily bread and fruit bowls, why your brain thrives on fat and cholesterol, and how you can spur the growth of new brain cells at any age. He offers an in-depth look at how we can take control of our "smart genes" through specific dietary choices and lifestyle habits, demonstrating how to remedy our most feared maladies
        <i>
         without drugs
        </i>
        . With a revolutionary 4-week plan, GRAIN BRAIN teaches us how we can reprogram our genetic destiny for the better.  GRAIN BRAIN is a #1
        <em>
         New York Times
        </em>
        bestseller and a finalist for a 2013 Books for a Better Life award.
       </div>
       <em>
       </em>
      </noscript>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3Cstrong%3EA%20%231%20%3Cem%3ENew%20York%20Times%3C%2Fem%3E%20bestseller--t%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cstrong%3Ehe%20devastating%20truth%20about%20the%20effects%20of%20wheat%2C%20sugar%2C%20and%20carbs%20on%20the%20brain%2C%20with%20a%204-week%20plan%20to%20achieve%20optimum%20health.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERenowned%20neurologist%20David%20Perlmutter%2C%20MD%2C%20blows%20the%20lid%20off%20a%20topic%20that%27s%20been%20buried%20in%20medical%20literature%20for%20far%20too%20long%3A%20carbs%20are%20destroying%20your%20brain.%20And%20not%20just%20unhealthy%20carbs%2C%20but%20even%20%3Cem%3Ehealthy%3C%2Fem%3E%20ones%20like%20whole%20grains%20can%20cause%20dementia%2C%20ADHD%2C%20anxiety%2C%20chronic%20headaches%2C%20depression%2C%20and%20much%20more.%20Dr.%20Perlmutter%20explains%20what%20happens%20when%20the%20brain%20encounters%20common%20ingredients%20in%20your%20daily%20bread%20and%20fruit%20bowls%2C%20why%20your%20brain%20thrives%20on%20fat%20and%20cholesterol%2C%20and%20how%20you%20can%20spur%20the%20growth%20of%20new%20brain%20cells%20at%20any%20age.%20He%20offers%20an%20in-depth%20look%20at%20how%20we%20can%20take%20control%20of%20our%20%22smart%20genes%22%20through%20specific%20dietary%20choices%20and%20lifestyle%20habits%2C%20demonstrating%20how%20to%20remedy%20our%20most%20feared%20maladies%20%3Ci%3Ewithout%20drugs%3C%2Fi%3E.%20With%20a%20revolutionary%204-week%20plan%2C%20GRAIN%20BRAIN%20teaches%20us%20how%20we%20can%20reprogram%20our%20genetic%20destiny%20for%20the%20better.%20%3C%2Fbr%3E%3C%2Fbr%3E%20GRAIN%20BRAIN%20is%20a%20%231%20%3Cem%3ENew%20York%20Times%3C%2Fem%3E%20bestseller%20and%20a%20finalist%20for%20a%202013%20Books%20for%20a%20Better%20Life%20award.",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>

                window.vellumLjDone = true;

                s.type = 'text/css';

           <b>

           </b>
           <script type="text/javascript">
            function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });
           </script>

    <div class="bucket" id="productDescription">
     <h2>
      Editorial Reviews
     </h2>
     <div class="content">
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       From Publishers Weekly
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       In his latest book, neurologist Perlmutter (The Better Brain Book) declares war on a common foodstuff, attributing a bewilderingly wide assortment of maladies to the consumption of gluten, a substance found in bread and other stock foods. Contrasting modern humans against idealized humans of the distant past, Perlmutter concludes that the former, whose average life expectancy at birth is about twice that of their Paleolithic ancestors, have gone off the proper track. He addresses the churlish objection that gluten has been part of the human diet for many millennia by firmly asserting that recent changes to crops have transformed a once-safe food into a terrible scourge. The book features health advice, a number of gluten-free recipes, and details on some relevant case studies. Lauded by such nonconsensus pundits as Mehmet Oz and William Davis, Perlmutter offers readers a comfortably simplistic model for thinking about carbs. Agent: Bonnie Solow, Solow Literary Enterprises. (Sept.)
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       Review
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       "Dr. Perlmutter outlines an innovative approach to our most fragile organ, the brain. He is an absolute leader in the use of alternative and conventional approaches in the treatment of neurologic disorders. I have referred him patients with wonderful results. He is on the cutting edge and can help change the way we practice medicine." --
       <strong>
        Mehmet Oz, MD
       </strong>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "Dr. Perlmutter takes us on a detailed tour of the destructive effects that 'healthy whole grains' have on our brains. Modern wheat, in particular, is responsible for destroying more brains in this country than all the strokes, car accidents, and head trauma combined. Dr. Perlmutter makes a persuasive case for this wheat-free approach to preserve brain health and functioning, or to begin the process of reversal." --
       <strong>
        William Davis, MD
       </strong>
       , author of
       <i>
        Wheat Belly
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "If you want to boost your brain power, keep your memory, and lift your mood and energy, as well as heal from a host of other common complaints, Dr. Perlmutter is your guide. This is the definitive instruction book for the care and feeding of your brain!" --
       <strong>
        Mark Hyman, MD
       </strong>
       , author of
       <i>
        The Blood Sugar Solution
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "Dementia and many other brain diseases are not inevitable, nor are they genetic. They are directly and powerfully linked to a diet high in sugar and grains.
       <i>
        Grain Brain
       </i>
       not only proves this, it also gives you everything you need to know to protect your brain--or a loved one's--now."--
       <strong>
        Christiane Northrup, MD
       </strong>
       , author of
       <i>
        Women's Bodies, Women's Wisdom
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "This book is a treasure. It is filled with self-empowering wisdom and easily understood leading-edge science. It can help you to avoid the devastating effects of an unhealthy diet and the dietary factors which are involved. By learning from the information presented in Dr. Perlmutter's book, you can avoid multiple health and neurological problems."--
       <strong>
        Bernie Siegel, MD
       </strong>
       , author of
       <i>
        Faith, Hope, and Healing
       </i>
       and
       <i>
        The Art of Healing
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "A provocative, eye-opening scientific account of how diet profoundly influences nerve health and brain function.
       <i>
        Grain Brain
       </i>
       explains how the American diet rich in gluten and inflammatory foods is linked to neurological conditions. Dr. Perlmutter outlines a blueprint for optimal health and a more resilient brain through proper nutrition and lifestyle.
       <i>
        Grain Brain
       </i>
       is a must-read!"--
       <strong>
        Gerard E. Mullin, MD
       </strong>
       , Associate Professor of Medicine, The Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, and author of
       <i>
        The Inside Tract: Your Good Gut Guide to Great Digestive Health
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "Dr. Perlmutter is the leading integrative medicine neurologist in North America today. His ability to fully integrate conventional medicine diagnosis and treatment with the latest innovations in nutritional and environmental medicine is phenomenal. As a teacher and clinician, he has fundamentally changed how physicians and patients think about neurological degeneration and, happily, regeneration." --
       <strong>
        Joseph Pizzorno, MD
       </strong>
       , coauthor of
       <i>
        Encyclopedia of Natural Medicine
       </i>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "Dr. Perlmutter provides sound advice, supported by the latest and most well respected medical research."  --
       <strong>
        Russell. B. Roth, MD
       </strong>
       , Past President, American Medical Association
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "A galvanizing call to arms against a gluten-heavy diet....Perlmutter's credentials as a board-certified neurologist and American College of Nutrition Fellow make him a uniquely qualified voice in the debate about which foods are best for the brain and body." --
       <strong>
        <em>
         Kirkus Reviews
        </em>
        <br/>
        <br/>
       </strong>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "Mind-blowing and disruptive to some long-standing beliefs about what our bodies require for optimal health...GRAIN BRAIN lays out an easy-to-understand roadmap packed with the latest science." --
       <strong>
        Max Lugavere,
        <em>
         Psychology Today
        </em>
       </strong>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       "A tour de force that is destined to save many lives. As I read this important and well-written book I found myself nodding my head vigorously in agreement at practically every page. [
       <em>
        Grain Brain
       </em>
       ] gives us what we need to know to be well again. Please read it." --
       <em>
        <strong>
         Health Central
        </strong>
       </em>
       <br/>

                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </a>
                </td>
                <td class="a-nowrap">
                 <span class="a-letter-space">
                 </span>
                 <span>
                  51
                 </span>
                </td>
               </tr>

       <div class="a-section" id="revMHLContainerChild">
        <div class="a-row">
         <div class="a-column a-span11" id="revMH">
          <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
           Most Helpful Customer Reviews
          </h3>
          <div class="a-section" id="revMHRL">
           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2CIY279KLFD56">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              388 of 441 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2CIY279KLFD56/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2CIY279KLFD56/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                5/5 stars!
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A1C77C8JH5RUT7/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Kate Lance
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on December 17, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2CIY279KLFD56">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Kindle Edition
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              This book is absolutely amazing. It is chock full of great information for the dieter who is looking to increase his knowledge on how exactly grains and different types of carbs can affect your brain.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I really enjoyed the writer's style, it helped keep me engaged and interested in the content, unlike other books on the same subject. The most interesting part is that I was able to lose a significant amount of weight just by following some of the guidelines in the book. I also took a supplement called
              <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Garcinia-Cambogia-NaturaBest-100-PURE/dp/B00G1SQ874/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk">
               Garcinia Cambogia
              </a>
              that has only accelerated my weight loss.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I have a child with ADHD so I really enjoyed the fact that ADHD and different types of gluten sensitivity were covered in grain brain. Since I have previously been on the primal diet, I knew some of the information since the two diets were similar, but not exactly the same. Prior to reading it I believed that gluten free and grain free were exactly the same which is not always the case.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I recommend that anyone read this book, it's a quick read and contains a ton of great information that can be extremely helpful. I was lucky to get this book as a gift from my lovely brother in law (Marcus) and really owe him one for this great read.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2CIY279KLFD56/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00BAXFCPO&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="5">
             5 Comments
            </a>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3I6YK023DN71Z">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              290 of 332 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3I6YK023DN71Z/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3I6YK023DN71Z/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                This is a "Must Read" for Brain Health
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A4V35W9XNM4X4/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Bill Cashell
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  TOP 1000 REVIEWER
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#vn">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  VINE VOICE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on August 21, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3I6YK023DN71Z">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-color-success a-text-bold">
              Vine Customer Review of Free Product
             </span>
             <span>
              (
              <a class="a-size-small a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/vine/help">
               What's this?
              </a>
              )
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               When I saw this title, I knew I had to read it. "Grain Brain" brought images of a cow at a computer. Since I am very interested in both the mind and good health, I wanted to learn more. Like so many people, I want to do anything I can to avoid dementia and Alzheimer's.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               So, who is Dr. Perlmutter and why should we listen to him? It turns out that he is one of the leading integrative medicine neurologists in North America today. He is the author of
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/The-Better-Brain-Book-Preventing/dp/1594480931/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk">
                The Better Brain Book: The Best Tool for Improving Memory and Sharpness and Preventing Aging of the Brain
               </a>
               and
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Power-Your-Brain-David-Perlmutter/dp/1401928188/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk">
                Power Up Your Brain
               </a>
               . Like Dr. Oz and Dr. Andrew Weil, he integrates conventional medicine diagnosis and treatment with the latest innovations in nutritional and environmental medicine. I love medical doctors who have traditional training and look for prevention rather than cure.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Dr. Perlmutter makes a bold promise that this program can help people with:
               <br/>
               * ADHD
               <br/>
               * Depression
               <br/>
               * Diabetes
               <br/>
               * Epilepsy
               <br/>
               * Insomnia
               <br/>
               * Intestinal problems
               <br/>
               * Memory problems and much more
               <br/>
               <br/>
               According to Dr. Perlmutter, the number one cause of brain disease is inflammation. Inflammation is our body's natural response to some kind of stress in the body. Prolonged inflammation leads to a reduction of cellular function followed by cellular destruction. This damages your body and your brain.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               So, where is this inflammation coming from?  The main source is processed food.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot; The sugars, simple carbs, some fruits and fruity drinks and fast foods that are causing diabetes are also causing brain degeneration. It is causing our bodies and brains to age prematurely due to oxidation - a biological type of \&quot;rusting\&quot;. Gluten is also our new mortal enemy.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;How do we avoid this fate worse than death? (or maybe it is death).  Here are a few of Dr. Perlmutter's suggestions.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;* Skip inflammatory oils like canola or corn oil. Instead, reach for alternatives like coconut or&lt;br /&gt;  extra virgin olive oil (I have started popping my popcorn in coconut oil - delicious!)&lt;br /&gt;* Incorporate only grass-fed meats into your diet (corn fed meat lacks omega-3)&lt;br /&gt;* To get more omega-3s in your diet, reach for supplements like DHA, ALA or fish oil.&lt;br /&gt;* Avoid excess fruit &amp; fruit juice. Occasional fruit is OK. Reach for apples or berries.&lt;br /&gt;* Get plenty of sleep&lt;br /&gt;* Exercise often (230% less chance of Alzheimer's)&lt;br /&gt;* Occasional one-day fast (as the seasons change)&lt;br /&gt;* Get enough Vitamin D&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;The book is very easy to read and loaded with great information. Dr Perlmutter has a great ability to make medical mumbo-jumbo clear and understandable.  There are numerous studies cited, and the last section includes easy to follow recipes. If you have read any of Dr. Daniel Amen's books like &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/The-Amen-Solution-Healthy-Thinner/dp/0307463613/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;The Amen Solution: The Brain Healthy Way to Get Thinner, Smarter, Happier&lt;/a&gt;, you will find many similarities.&lt;br /&gt;If you want to read more about the effects of inflammation on your body, you might want to check out &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Meals-That-Heal-Inflammation-Eliminate/dp/140194034X/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Meals That Heal Inflammation: Embrace Healthy Living and Eliminate Pain, One Meal at at Time&lt;/a&gt;.&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Grain-Brain-Surprising-Sugar-Your-Killers/product-reviews/031623480X/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R3I6YK023DN71Z">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2LA8EHJSKL4XO">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              40 of 42 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2LA8EHJSKL4XO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2LA8EHJSKL4XO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                I didn't know . . .
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A3KQ38CZA2XJ56/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Susan Siemers
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on December 24, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2LA8EHJSKL4XO">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Kindle Edition
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I am a low carber, and I thought I was pretty up on things.  I've lost 35 pounds, gotten off of meds that had nasty side effects, and felt pretty knowledgeable about low carbohydrate eating.  However, I am gaining weight back, mainly from cheating, and after reading this book, I know which cheats are causing me real distress!  Who would think that the glycemic index for a piece of whole grain bread is higher than that of table sugar?
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I know I am extra sensitive to carbohydrates, but have always thought that I could eat foods containing gluten with no penalty except for the carbs.  I have changed my mind.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              This book is clearly written and sends up the warning flag for how our modern diets are killing us early.  Add to that our penchant for cheap food that allows Monsanto to march on with their GMO program, and we are heading down a slippery slope.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              Time to wake up.  Read this book.  Heed the author's warning.  Change your way of eating.  Clear up your brain fog, reduce your waistline, preserve your youth a little longer.  Well worth the read.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2LA8EHJSKL4XO/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00BAXFCPO&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="0">
             Comment
            </a>
