           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R23F6N9LGDDJFW">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              525 of 609 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R23F6N9LGDDJFW/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R23F6N9LGDDJFW/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=031623480X&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                GREAT book!  A gamechanger!
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/AJWQKYD4B4Q8V/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                feemeister
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#vn">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  VINE VOICE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on August 18, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R23F6N9LGDDJFW">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-color-success a-text-bold">
              Vine Customer Review of Free Product
             </span>
             <span>
              (
              <a class="a-size-small a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/vine/help">
               What's this?
              </a>
              )
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               This book is phenomenal.  There is SO much good information in here.  I'm not a fast reader, but I read this book in one day; I couldn't put it down.  The writing style is very easy to understand and interesting.  The info is invaluable.  This is one of the gamechanger books!
               <br/>
               <br/>
               There are so many things to learn about.  Such as!  The fatter you get, the more your brain shrinks (this explains a lot for me)!  And the portion of your brain that shrinks is the cognitive and memory portions. And the fact that diabetes sets you up for dementia and Alzheimer's.  There is lots of information on inflammation and its role in many illnesses, including nervous and brain diseases.  There is also info in here on depression and how a lot of it is related to gluten sensitivity.  ADHD is covered in depth.  This book should enable many people to get off  medications if they will try this lifestyle.  I have easily thought of a dozen people I think would be helped by reading it.  If I could, I would order multiple copies to give away.  This book has so much really important information for so many people.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               There was much information on gluten sensitivity and insulin sensitivity.  He went into lots of great detail on how many different ways the diet influences your body and your state of health (or disease)!  I am going to reread this book and make lots of notes on all this important information (that's how good this book is; I normally don't do that).
               <br/>
               <br/>
               A lot of the information in this book I knew about from studying up on the Paleo diet.  The diet is very similar to Paleo, but not the same; I noticed a few differences.  (For example, this book is for gluten free whereas Paleo is straight grain free.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;I really think it would be worth combining this protocol with the one Byron Richards has in Mastering Leptin.  He goes very deeply into hormone work with leptin, insulin, gherin, etc.  He advocates meal spacing and not snacking, which really works wonders at taking away hunger.  (It seems that snacking on anything, even if it's celery, gets all the hormones going that need to be resting between meals.  Not good for leptin or insulin resistance, or for fat burning.  His is another phenomenal book.)&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;I definitely recommend this book for everyone.  It contains so many different types of information that I think it will be helpful for everyone.  I consider myself very lucky to have run across this book; I am definitely going to buy more books by this author!&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Grain-Brain-Surprising-Sugar-Your-Killers/product-reviews/031623480X/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R23F6N9LGDDJFW">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
     if(typeof setCSMReq == 'function') {
        setCSMReq('cf');
  }else {
     if(typeof uet == 'function') {
        uet('cf');
     }
     amznJQ.completedStage('amznJQ.criticalFeature');
  }
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
     P.when("cf").execute(function(){

               P.load.js('http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/udpFeatureJavascript/udpFeatureJavascript-2925159769._V1_.js');
               
});

amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
  amznJQ.available('search-js-jq', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('amazonShoveler', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('simsJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('cmuAnnotations', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('externalJS.tagging', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('amzn-ratings-bar', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('accessoriesJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('priceformatterJS', function(){});
  amznJQ.available('CustomerPopover', function(){});

if (!window.DPClientLogger) {
    window.DPClientLogger = {};
}

window.DPClientLogger.ImpressionLogger = function( program_group, feature, forceUpload, controlledLogging) {
    var self = this,
    data = {};
    var isBooksUdploggingDisabled = false;
    var enableNewCSMs = false;
    var newCSMs = ["ma-books-image-ftb-shown","ma-books-image-listen-shown","ma-img-gallery-opened","ma-img-gallery-zoom","ma-img-gallery-thumb"];

    enableNewCSMs = true;

    self.logImpression = function(key) {
      if(!(isBooksUdploggingDisabled && controlledLogging !== undefined && controlledLogging)){
          var isNewCSM = self.isKeyNewCSM(key);
          if(!isNewCSM || ( isNewCSM && enableNewCSMs)){
              data[key]=1;
              setTimeout( self.upload, 2000 ); // upload client side metrics after 2secs of recording it.
          }
      } 
    };

    self.isKeyNewCSM = function(key){
      var isNewCSM = false;
      jQuery.each(newCSMs, function(index,csm){
          if(csm == key){
              isNewCSM = true;
          }
      });
      return isNewCSM;
    };

    self.upload = function() {
      var t = [];
      jQuery.each(data, function(k,v){ t.push(k); });
      data = {};
      if(t.length > 0){
        var protocol = location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://" : "http://",
            url = protocol + ue.furl + "/1/action-impressions/1/OP/" + program_group + "/action/" + feature + ":" + t.join() + "?marketplaceId=" + ue.mid + "&requestId=" + ue.rid + "&session=" + ue.sid + "&_=" + (new Date()).getTime();
        (new Image()).src = url;
      }
    };

    if(forceUpload) {
        jQuery(window).unload(function() { self.upload();});
    }
};
amznJQ.onReady("jQuery", function(){
  amznJQ.declareAvailable("DPClientLogger");
});

if (typeof(loadState) != "undefined" && !loadState) {

(function(){
    if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function'){
        if((typeof(loadState) != "undefined") && !loadState){
            if(jQuery.browser.msie){
                ue.tag("msie-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.mozilla) {
                ue.tag("mozilla-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.safari) {
                ue.tag("safari-img-not-loaded");
            } else if(jQuery.browser.webkit) {
                ue.tag("webkit-img-not-loaded");
            } else {
                ue.tag("unknown-img-not-loaded");
            }
        }
    }
})();
}

});
    </script>
    <link href="http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/communities/profile/customer-popover/style-3._V248984170_.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>

     amznJQ.addLogical('search-sabc', ["http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/search-sabc/search-sabc-3619848471._V1_.js"]);
    amznJQ.addLogical('CustomerPopover', ["http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/communities/profile/customer-popover/script-13-min._V224617671_.js"]);
    </script>
    <script language="javascript">
     var cloudfrontImg = new Image();if (location.protocol == "http:") {if (window.addEventListener) {window.addEventListener("load", function() {setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "http://cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);}, false);} else if (window.attachEvent) {window.attachEvent("onload", function() {setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "http://cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);});}}
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
     amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() { 
  var DPCL;
  amznJQ.available("DPClientLogger", function(){
          if( typeof window.DPClientLogger != 'undefined' ) { 
            DPCL = new window.DPClientLogger.ImpressionLogger("dpbxapps", "bxapps-atfMarker", true, true);
          }
  });
  jQuery('.oneClickSignInLink').click(function(e) {
    if (DPCL) {
        DPCL.logImpression("ma-books-oneClick-signIn-T");
    }
    return true;
  });
});
    </script>

        var adPropertiesDelimiter = "__";
        var adCount = 3;
        var slDiv =  'AUI_SlDiv';
        var expectedHeightWide = 34;
        var expectedHeightMiddle = 56;
       	var reformatType = '0';
       	
        var divWideName = slDiv + '_0'; //div associated with wide ads
        var divMiddleName = slDiv + '_1'; //div associated with middle ads
        var heightOfOneAd = $('#' + divWideName).height() / adCount;
        if( heightOfOneAd > expectedHeightWide ) {
        	reformatType = '1';
            var newAdsHtml = '<tr>'
             + '    <td>'
             + '     <ul>'
             + '		<li>'
             + '         <a class="a-size-medium" style="font-size:15px; padding-top:2px; display:inline-block;" target="_blank" href="'

             + '     </li>'
             + '		</ul>'
             + '    </td>'
             + '    <td style="padding-left: 20px;">'
             + '         <span class="a-size-base" style="padding-top:2px; display:inline-block;">'
             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'description' + adPropertiesDelimiter
             + '</span>'
             + '    </td>'
             + '</tr>'
             + '<tr>'
             + '     <td style="padding-top:0px;">'
             + '     </td>'
             + '    <td style="padding-left: 20px; padding-top:0px; line-height:1;">'
             + '         <a style="display:inline-block; padding-bottom:10px;" target="_blank" href="'
             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'redirectUrl' + adPropertiesDelimiter
             + '" rel="nofollow"><span class="a-color-secondary">'
             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'visibleUrl' + adPropertiesDelimiter
             + '</span></a>'
             + '    </td>'
             + '</tr>';

            dumpHtml(obj, newAdsHtml,'<div id="AUI_SlDiv_1"><div id="AUI_A9AdsWidgetAdsWrapper"><table style="width:auto; margin-top:10px;" class="AUI_SponsoredLinkColumnAds">  <tbody> ', '</tbody> </table> </div></div>', divWideName);
            
           var heightOfOneAd = $('#' + divMiddleName).height() / adCount;
           if( heightOfOneAd > expectedHeightMiddle ) {
             reformatType = '2';
             var newAdsHtml = '<div class="AUI_SponsoredLinkItem"><div style="padding-top:10px;"><ul><li><a class="a-size-medium" style="font-size:15px; padding-top:2px; display:inline-block;" target="_blank" href="'

             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'title' + adPropertiesDelimiter

             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'redirectUrl' + adPropertiesDelimiter

             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'visibleUrl' + adPropertiesDelimiter
             + '</span></a>  </div>  <div class="a-size-base" style="padding-left:23px;">'
             + adPropertiesDelimiter + 'description' + adPropertiesDelimiter
             + '</div></div>';

             dumpHtml(obj, newAdsHtml,'<div id="AUI_SlDiv_2"><div id="AUI_A9AdsWidgetAdsWrapper">', '</div></div>', divMiddleName);
           }
 
        }

		if( typeof A9_SL_CSM_JS != 'undefined' ){
		  A9_SL_CSM_JS($, reformatType);
		}

        function dumpHtml( obj, newAdsHtml, topHtml, bottomHtml, divParent ) {
              var i = 0;
              var completeAdsHtml = '';
              for( x in obj ) {
                  var adChunks = newAdsHtml.split( adPropertiesDelimiter );
                  for( var j = 0; j<adChunks.length; j++ ) {
                      if( typeof obj[i][adChunks[j]] != "undefined" ) {
                          adChunks[j] = obj[i][adChunks[j]];
                      }
                  }
                  completeAdsHtml += adChunks.join("");
                  i++;
              }
              newAdsHtml = topHtml + completeAdsHtml + bottomHtml;
              $('#' + divParent).replaceWith(newAdsHtml);
        }
	});

	    var feedbackFormAvailable = 0;
	    function showSLF() {
	         if(!feedbackFormAvailable) {
	           // Make a request to the handler with new ads 
	           jQuery.post('/gp/product/aui_feedback_form_handler.html', { 'sid': '183-6149523-2214366','jsonAds' : escape(jsonAds) } ,function(data) {
	               $('#FeedbackFormDiv').html(data);
	               $('#FeedbackFormDiv').show();
	               $('#ShowFeedbackLinkDiv').hide();
	               $('#ResponseFeedbackLinkDiv').hide(); 
	               feedbackFormAvailable = 1;
	           });
	         } else {
	           $('#reports-ads-abuse-form').show();
	           $('#FeedbackFormDiv').show();
	           $('#reports-ads-abuse').show();
	           $('#ShowFeedbackLinkDiv').hide();
	           $('#ResponseFeedbackLinkDiv').hide(); 
	         }
	    }
	    $('#LetUsKnowLink').click(showSLF);
	    $('#ShowFeedbackLinkDiv').show();
	});
    </script>

         <div class="rhf_loading_outer">
          <table class="rhf_loading_middle">
           <tr>
            <td class="rhf_loading_inner">
             <img src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/ui/loadIndicators/loadIndicator-large._V192195480_.gif"/>
            </td>
           </tr>
          </table>
         </div>
         <script type="text/JavaScript">
          window.rhf_use_AUI = 1 && typeof P === 'object' && P.AUI_BUILD_DATE;


window.rhf_use_AUI_lib = typeof P === 'object' && P.AUI_BUILD_DATE;

if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
    

amznJQ.addLogical('p13nlogger', ['http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/p13nlogger/p13nlogger-3861958816._V1_.js']);
amznJQ.addLogical('callOnVisible', ['http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/browser-scripts/callOnVisible/callOnVisible-66186444._V1_.js']);

var rhfP13NLogger = function(rhfWaitTime, success) {
    amznJQ.onReady('callOnVisible', function () {        
        var rhfContainer = jQuery("#rhf_container");
        var action = success ? 'view' : 'ajax_failure';
       	if (typeof rhfContainer.callOnVisible == 'function') {
	    rhfContainer.callOnVisible(function () {
                var rhfLog = function(eventData) {
		    amznJQ.onReady('p13nlogger', function() {
			var commonData = {
		            channel: 'recommendations',
			    widget: 'pd_rhf',
			    featureElement: rhfContainer,
			    requestInfoElement: '#rhf0RequestInfo'
			};
			p13n.logEvent(jQuery.extend({}, commonData, eventData));
		    });
		};
		rhfLog({
		   action: action,
		   page: 1,
		   eventtime: rhfWaitTime,
		   meta: {'isRHFLoaded': success}
		});
	    }, 0); 
        }
    });
};

var rhfRVIP13NLogger = function() {
        var rviContainer = jQuery("#horizontal-list");
        var shvlContainer = jQuery('#rhf_upsell_div');
        var isEventComplete = function() {
            return shvlContainer.find('.rhf_loading_outer').size() == 0;
        };
        var rviLog = function(eventData) {
            amznJQ.onReady('p13nlogger', function() {
               var commonData = {
                   channel: 'recommendations',
                   widget: 'pd_rhf',
                   isEventComplete: isEventComplete,
                   featureElement: shvlContainer,
                   requestInfoElement: '#rhf0RequestInfo'
               };
              p13n.logAsyncEvent(jQuery.extend({}, commonData, eventData));
            });
        };
        rviContainer.find('.rhf-RVIs').click(function() {
            rviLog({
                action: 'rvi_click',
                page: 1
            });
        });
        rviContainer.find('.clearSelection').click(function() {
            rviLog({
                action: 'clear_click',
                page: 1 
            }); 
        });
};

}

var rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction = function($) { (function($) {

    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading = false;
    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded = false;
    window.RECS_rhfInView = false;
    window.RECS_rhfMetrics = {};
    
    var rhfWaitTime = 0;

    $("#rhf_container").show();
    var rhfShvlEventHandler = function () {
        if (   ! window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded
            && ! window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading
            && $('#rhf_container').size() > 0 ) {
            var yPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
            var rhfElementFound = $('#rhfMainHeading').size();
            var rhfPosition = $('#rhfMainHeading').offset().top;

            if (/webkit.*mobile/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                rhfPosition -= $(window).scrollTop();
            }

            if (rhfElementFound && ( rhfPosition - yPosition < 400 )) {
                window.RECS_rhfMetrics["start"] = (new Date()).getTime();
                window.RECS_rhfShvlLoading = true;
                var handleSuccess = function (html) {
                    $("#rhf_container").html(html);
                    $("#rhf0Shvl").trigger("render-shoveler");
                    window.RECS_rhfShvlLoaded = true;
                    window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] = (new Date()).getTime();
                    if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
                        rhfWaitTime = window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] - window.RECS_rhfMetrics["inView"];
		        rhfP13NLogger(rhfWaitTime, true);
                        rhfRVIP13NLogger();
                    }
                };
                var handleError = function () {
                    $("#rhf_container").hide();
                    $("#rhf_error").show();
                    window.RECS_rhfMetrics["loaded"] = "error";
                    if (!window.rhf_use_AUI_lib) {
                        rhfP13NLogger(rhfWaitTime, false);
                    }
                };
                var ajaxURL = '/gp/history/external/full-rhf-rec-handler.html';
                var ajaxArgs = {
                    type: "POST",
                    timeout: 10000,
                    data: {
                        shovelerName    : 'rhf0',
                        key             : 'rhf',
                        numToPreload    : '8',
                        isGateway       : 0,
                        refTag          : 'pd_rhf_dp',
                        parentSession   : '183-6149523-2214366',
                        relatedRequestId: '1FQZ4G2YTGWT8496YJ5E',
                        excludeASIN     : '031623480X',
                        renderPopover   : 0,
                        forceSprites    : 1,
                        currentPageType : 'Detail',
                        currentSubPageType : 'Glance',
                        weblabTriggers  : "",
                        // We'll pretend that AUI is disabled everywhere until all AUI carousel bugs are fixed.
                        isAUI           : window.rhf_use_AUI ? 1 : 0
                    },
                    dataType: "json",
                    success: function (data, status) {
                        if (typeof(data) === 'object' && data.success && data.html) {
                            handleSuccess(data.html);
                            if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
                                P.when("jQuery", "a-carousel-framework").execute(function(jQuery, framework){
                                  jQuery("#rhf_upsell_div .a-carousel-viewport").addClass("a-carousel-slide");
                                  framework.createAll();
                                });
                            }
                        } else {
                            handleError();
                        }
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, status) {
                        handleError();
                    }
                };
                if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
                    P.when("A").execute(function (A) {
                        A.$.ajax(ajaxURL, ajaxArgs);
                    });
                } else {
                    ajaxArgs['url'] = ajaxURL;
                    $.ajax(ajaxArgs);
                }
            }
        }
    };
    var getDuplicateASINList = function() {
        var cartRecsASINList;
        if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
            var cartCarouselParams = $("div[data-p13n-widget = 'pd_cart_recs']").attr("data-a-carousel-options");
            if (cartCarouselParams) {     
                cartRecsASINList = JSON.parse(cartCarouselParams).ajax.id_list;
                //Get first 10 of the List, will get all of them if less than 10
                return JSON.stringify(cartRecsASINList.slice(0, 10));
            }
        } else if (window.RECS_cartRecs_ASINList) {
            cartRecsASINList = window.RECS_cartRecs_ASINList;
            return JSON.stringify(cartRecsASINList.slice(0, 10));
        }
        return cartRecsASINList;
    };
    var rhfInView = function() {
        if (!window.RECS_rhfInView && $('#rhf_container').size() > 0) {
            var yPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
            var rhfElementFound = ($('#rhfMainHeading').size() > 0);
            var rhfPosition = $('#rhfMainHeading').offset().top;
            if (/webkit.*mobile/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                rhfPosition -= $(window).scrollTop();
            }
            if (rhfElementFound && ( rhfPosition - yPosition < 0 )) {
                window.RECS_rhfInView = true;
                window.RECS_rhfMetrics["inView"] = (new Date()).getTime();
            }
        }
    };
    window.rhfYBHTurnOn = function () {
            $.ajax({
                  url: '/gp/history/external/full-rhf-ybh-on-handler.html',
                  type: "POST",
                  timeout: 2000,
                  data: {
                         parentSession    : '183-6149523-2214366'
                  },
                  dataType: "text",
                  success: function (data, status) {
                               $("#yourBrowsingHistoryOnText").find('p').html("You don't have any recently viewed Items.");
                               $("#rhf-ybh-turn-on-link").hide();
                  }
            });
    };
    $(document).ready(rhfShvlEventHandler);
    $(document).ready(rhfInView);
    $(window).scroll(rhfShvlEventHandler);
    $(window).scroll(rhfInView);
})($); }
if (window.rhf_use_AUI) {
    //Register a component
    P.when('jQuery', 'ready').register('rhf-bootstrapper', function($){
       return {
            bootstrap : function(){
                return rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction($);
            }
       };
    });
    //Use that component after it initializes
    P.when('rhf-bootstrapper').execute(function(rhfBootstrapper){
        rhfBootstrapper.bootstrap();
    });
} else {
    amznJQ.onReady(
        'jQuery',
        function () {
            rhfShovelerBootstrapFunction(jQuery);
        }
     );
}
         </script>
        </div>

         <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-top: 10px" width="100%">

/* customer-reviews-read-more */


P.when("A").execute(function(A) {
    var jQuery         = A.$;
    function showFullReview(event) {
        event.$event.preventDefault();
        event.$target.hide();
    
        var parent = event.$target.parent().parent();
        var fullText = parent.find(".MHRHead").html() +  event.data.rest;
        var pxInitialSize = parent.height();
          
        parent.html(fullText);
        var pxTargetSize = parent.height();
        parent.height(pxInitialSize);
        parent.animate({height: pxTargetSize + 'px'}, 400, function(){parent.css("height", "auto")});
    }
    
    A.declarative("columnbalancing-showfullreview", ["click"], showFullReview);
});


/* customer-reviews */



  
P.when("A").execute(function(A) {
   
   function vote(event) {
     var root = A.$(event.data.rootComponentId);
     var target = event.$target;
     root.find(".cr-vote-buttons").addClass("a-hidden");
     root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").removeClass("a-hidden");
       
     A.get(target.attr("href") + "&type=json&_=" + (new Date()).getTime(),
     {
	   dataType: 'json',
	   ajaxTimeout: 10000,
	   success: function(data, textStatus){ 
         success(data, root, target);
       },
	   error: function(XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown){
         error(root, target);
       }
	 });
     event.$event.preventDefault();

   }

   function isNoButton(target) {       
     return target.closest(".noButton").length > 0;
   }

   function success(data, root, target) {
       if (data.redirect == 1) {
	   window.location.href = target.attr("href");
       } else if (data.error == 1) {
	   error(root, target);
       } else {
	   if (isNoButton(target)) {
               root.find(".cr-vote-inapp").removeClass("a-hidden");
	       
	   }
	   root.find(".cr-vote-success").removeClass("a-hidden");	   
	   root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").addClass("a-hidden");
       }
   }

   function error(root, target) {
       root.find(".cr-vote-error").removeClass("a-hidden");	   
       root.find(".cr-vote-feedback").addClass("a-hidden");
   }

   A.declarative("cr-vote", ["click"], vote);
});



/* customer-reviews-badges */

             P.when("A").register("cr_popup", function(A) {
                 function popup(event) {
                     var data = event.data;
                     var toolbar = data.toolbar;
                     if (typeof toolbar === 'undefined') {
                         toolbar = 0;
                     }

                     var jqEvent = event.$event;
                     var url = event.$target.closest("a").attr("href");
                     amz_js_PopWin(url,data.title,'width=' + data.width + ',height=' + data.height + ',resizable=1,scrollbars=1,toolbar=' + toolbar + ',status=1');
                     jqEvent.preventDefault();
                 }
                 A.declarative("cr-popup", ["click"], popup);
             });
            

/* quotes-speech-bubble-layout */


P.when("A").register("#quotesTable", function(A){
  var jQuery   = A.$;
  
  var reviewTopContainer = jQuery("#reviewTopContainer");
  var reviewContainer = jQuery("#reviewContainer");   
  var revMHLContainer = jQuery("#revMHLContainer");
  balanceQuotes();

  function balanceQuotes() {
    var mhlWidth = revMHLContainer.width();
    if (785 > mhlWidth) {
      reviewTopContainer.prependTo(reviewContainer);
    } else {
      reviewTopContainer.prependTo(revMHLContainer);
    }
  }
   
  jQuery(window).resize(balanceQuotes);
});

     if (!window.$SearchJS && window.$Nav) {
  window.$SearchJS = $Nav.make('sx');
}
if (window.$SearchJS) {

$SearchJS.when('jQuery').run('jQuery-unload-patch', function(jQuery) {
  if (jQuery.fn.jquery == '1.2.6') {
    var windowUnloadHandlers = jQuery.data(window, "events").unload;
    for (var origUnloadUnbinder in windowUnloadHandlers) {
      break;
    }
    jQuery(window).unbind('unload', windowUnloadHandlers[origUnloadUnbinder]).unload(function(){
      if (jQuery.browser.msie) {
        // taken from http://bugs.jquery.com/attachment/ticket/2698/unload.js
        var elems = document.getElementsByTagName('*'),
            pos = elems.length + 1, // +1 for the document
            dummy = {};

        jQuery.data( dummy );
        for( var expando in dummy );

        while( pos-- ){
          var elem = elems[ pos ] || document, //add the document
          id = elem[expando];

          if( id && jQuery.cache[id] && jQuery.cache[id].events )
            jQuery.event.remove( elem );
        }
      }
    });
  }
});

<script language="Javascript1.1" type="text/javascript">
    
  function dpCSSSetMinWidth() {
	var elem = document.getElementById("divsinglecolumnminwidth");
	if (elem) {
                dpCSSSetElemWidth(elem);
	}
  }
  
  function dpCSSSetElemWidth(elem) {
      if (elem) {
         var clientWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth ? document.documentElement.clientWidth : document.body.clientWidth;
         elem.runtimeStyle.width = (clientWidth < 920 ? '920px' : '100%' );
      }
  }
  
  if ( -1 != navigator.userAgent.indexOf("MSIE") ) {
      window.onresize = dpCSSSetMinWidth;
  }
</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions & special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c == 0){
        if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function') {
            ue.tag(customtag);
        }
    }
}

var dealNotifier = null;

var ldNotifierCallback = function(auiJQ) {
  if (window.navbar != null && window.navbar.getLightningDealsData != null &&
      typeof window.navbar.getLightningDealsData == 'function') { 

    var lightningDealsData = window.navbar.getLightningDealsData();
    var url = '/gp/deal/ajax/getNotifierData.html' +
              '?customerID='  + lightningDealsData.customerID +
              '&sessionID='   + '183-6149523-2214366' +
              '&hasATCAsins=' + ((lightningDealsData.activeItems.length>0)?1:0);
                
    var dealResourcesCallback = function(result) {
        if (!window.gbResources) {
            window.gbResources = new GBResources();
        }
        gbResources.registerFromJSON(result.resourceData);
        dealNotifier = new window.DealNotifier({
            thresholdOffset : '10',
            wlexp           : true,
            isAuiBased      : 1,
            sessionId       : '183-6149523-2214366',
            now             : '1398317211',
            popupSkin       : '  <div style="width: 335px;" class="lightningDealsPopupAlert">   <div style="position: relative;">     <table style="border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%;">       <tr>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); width: 25px; height: 15px;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 0 0;">&nbsp;</td>          <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); background-repeat: repeat-x; background-position: 0 -68px;">&nbsp;</td>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); width: 25px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: -35px 0;">&nbsp;</td>       </tr>       <tr>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-v._V197405518_.png); width: 25px; background-repeat: repeat-y;">&nbsp;</td>         <td style=" background-color: #ffd; padding: 5px; font-family: verdana, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; line-height: 14px;">           <div class="ap_content">         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-v._V197405518_.png); width: 25px; background-repeat: repeat-y; background-position: -35px 0;">&nbsp;</td>       </tr>       <tr>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); width: 25px; height: 15px;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-position: 0 -40px;">&nbsp;</td>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); height: 20px; background-repeat: repeat-x; background-position: 0 -108px; ">&nbsp;</td>         <td style="background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); width: 25px; background-repeat: repeat-y; background-position: -35px -40px;">&nbsp;</td>       </tr>      </table>     <div class="ap_close" style="position: absolute; top: 15px; right: 15px; height: 16px; width: 16px;"><a class="ap_closebutton" href="#" style="display: block; background-image: url(http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/goldbox/lightning-deals/sprite-h._V156433805_.png); background-position: 0 -136px; text-decoration: none; background-repeat:no-repeat;  height: 16px; width: 16px;">&nbsp;</a></div>   </div> </div> ',
            debug           : false,
            waitlistedAsins : result.waitlistedAsins
        });
    };

    var params = {
        success: function(result) {
                  if (typeof(amznJQ) === "object") {
                    amznJQ.onReady('dealResources', function() {
                        dealResourcesCallback(result);
                    });
                  } else {
                    P.when('goldbox-dealResources').execute(function() {
                        dealResourcesCallback(result);
                    });
                  }
                 },
            url: url,
            type: "POST",
            data: {},
            dataType: 'json'
    };

    if (typeof(amznJQ) === "object") {
       jQuery.ajax(params);
    } else {
       auiJQ.ajax(params);
    }
  }
};

if (typeof(amznJQ) === "object") {
  amznJQ.onReady('jQuery', function() {
    jQuery(window).load(function() {
        amznJQ.onReady('lightningDealNotifier',function() {
            ldNotifierCallback();
        });
    });
  });
} else if(typeof window.P === "object" && typeof window.P.when === "function") {
  P.when('A').execute(function(A) {
    A.$(window).load(function() {
       P.when('legacy-popover','goldbox-'+'lightningDealNotifier').execute(function() {
          ldNotifierCallback(A.$);
       });
    });        
  });
}

       <script type="text/javascript">
        var imageSrc = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg";
    var colorImages = {"initial":[{"large":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L.jpg","landing":["http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg"],"thumb":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._SS30_.jpg","main":["http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg","http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg"]},{"large":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL.jpg","landing":["http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg"],"thumb":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._SS30_.jpg","main":["http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg","http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-sticker-arrow-click,TopRight,35,-76_AA300_SH20_OU01_.jpg"]}]};

    (function(doc) {
        var mi = doc.getElementById("main-image");
        var w = window.innerWidth || doc.body.offsetWidth;
        w--;
        var widths = [1280];
        var sz = 0;
        for(;sz < 1 && w >= widths[sz];  sz++);
        if(sz || 1)  {
            var miw = doc.getElementById("main-image-widget");
            miw.className = miw.className.replace(/size[0-9]+/,"size"+sz);
		if(sz && 1 ) {
                    mi.width  = 300;
                    mi.height = 300;
                } else if( !sz && 1 ) { 
                    mi.width  = 300;
                    mi.height = 300;
                }
             
            amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.AboveTheFold", function() {
                    var src = colorImages.initial[0].main[sz];
                var img = new Image();
                img.onload = function() {
                    var clone = mi.cloneNode(true);
                    clone.src = src;
                    clone.removeAttribute("width");
                    clone.removeAttribute("height");
                    clone.removeAttribute("onload");
                    mi.parentNode.replaceChild(clone, mi);
                    mi = clone;
                    amznJQ.declareAvailable('ImageBlockATF');
                };
                img.src = src;
            });
           } else {
    	        amznJQ.declareAvailable('ImageBlockATF');
	   }
        mi.style.display = "inline";
    })(document);

                <script type="text/javascript">
                 function rentalOpenPopover(options) {
  options.group = 'rentals';
  options.closeText = 'Close';
  options.clone=true;
  window.rentalActivePopover = jQuery.AmazonPopover.displayPopover(options);
  
  return false;
}
function rentalClosePopover() {
  if (typeof window.rentalActivePopover == 'object') {
     window.rentalActivePopover.close();
     window.rentalActivePopover = undefined;
  }
  return false;
}
                </script>

              <script type="text/javascript">
               var legacyOnSelectedQuantityChange = function () {
    if (jQuery("#pricePlusShippingQty").length > 0) {
      jQuery.ajax({
        url: "/gp/product/du/quantity-sip-update.html?_encoding=UTF-8",
        data: {
          qt: jQuery("#quantityDropdownDiv select").val(),
          a : jQuery("#ASIN").val(),
          me: jQuery("#merchantID").val(),
          ddmState:    jQuery("#ddmState").text(),
          ddmCity:     jQuery("#ddmCity").text(),
          ddmDistrict: jQuery("#ddmDistrict").text()
        },
        dataType: "html",
        success: function(sipHtml){
          jQuery("#pricePlusShippingQty").html(sipHtml);
        }
      });
    }
};
amznJQ.onReady('jQuery', function() {
  jQuery("#quantityDropdownDiv select").change(legacyOnSelectedQuantityChange);
  amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
    amznJQ.available('quantityDropDownJS', function() {
        var qdd = new jQuery.fn.quantityDropDown();
        qdd.setPopoverContent("<strong>We're sorry.  This item is limited to %d per customer.</strong>","<br /><br />We strive to provide customers with great prices, and sometimes that means we limit quantity to ensure that the majority of customers have an opportunity to order products that have very low prices or a limited supply.<br /><br />We may also adjust quantity in checkout if you have recently purchased this item.");
    });
  });
});
              </script>

              <script type="text/javascript">
               amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
    amznJQ.available('bbopCheckBoxJS', function() {
        var bbopJS = new jQuery.fn.bbopCheckBox();
        bbopJS.initialize(0,0,"To get FREE Two-Day Shipping on this item, proceed to checkout using &quot;Add to Cart&quot;");
    });
});
              </script>

               var gbSecure1Click = true;
if(typeof(gbSecure1Click) != 'undefined' && gbSecure1Click){
  amznJQ.onReady('jQuery',
    function () {
      jQuery("#oneClickBuyButton").click(
        function () {
          var hbbAction = jQuery('#handleBuy').attr("action").replace("http:", "https:");
          jQuery('#handleBuy').attr("action", hbbAction );
          return true;
        }
      );
    }
  );
}
              </script>

    jQuery("#oneClickSignInLinkID").attr("href",window.gbvar);
  });
}
else{
window.gbvar = "https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/utility/edit-one-click-pref.html?ie=UTF8&query=selectObb%3Dnew&returnPath=%2Fgp%2Fproduct%2F1449355730";
}

                <script type="text/javascript">
                 if(window.gbvar){

    jQuery("#oneClickSignInLinkID").attr("href",window.gbvar);
  });
}
else{

                <a class="oneClickSignInLink" href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/utility/edit-one-click-pref.html?ie=UTF8&amp;query=selectObb%3Dnew&amp;returnPath=%2Fgp%2Fproduct%2F1449355730" id="oneClickSignInLinkID">

          </span>

           <!-- &nbsp; -->
          </span>
          <span class="cBoxBR">
           <!-- &nbsp; -->
          </span>
          <span class="cBoxB">

          <div class="cBoxInner" style="text-align: center;">
           <div class="GFTButtonCondo" style="display: block;">
            <input name="rsid" type="hidden" value="183-6149523-2214366"/>
            <input name="sourceVendorId" type="hidden" value="website.wishlist.detail.add"/>
            <div align="center" style="height: 22px; padding: 4px; position: relative; z-index: 3; white-space: nowrap;">
             <div class="wishlist_btn_div_non_js" id=" wishlist_btn_div_non_js">
              <input alt="Choose Wish List or Gift Idea List" border="0" class="dpSprite s_add2WishList" id="" name="submit.add-to-registry.wishlist" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._V386942464_.gif" title="" type="image" value=""/>
             </div>
             <div class="wishlist_btn_div_js" id=" wishlist_btn_div_js" style="display: none">
              <input alt="Add to Wish List" border="0" class="dpSprite s_add2WishListLeft wishlistAddButtonActive" id="" name="submit.add-to-registry.wishlist" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._V386942464_.gif" title="Add to Wish List" type="image" value=""/>
              <input alt="Choose Wish List or Gift Idea List" border="0" class="dpSprite s_add2WishListRight wishlistDownButtonActive" id="" name="reglist|a|asin" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._V386942464_.gif" title="Choose Wish List or Gift Idea List" type="image" value=""/>

            <script type="text/javascript">
             if (typeof window.amznJQ != 'undefined') {
  amznJQ.onReady('popover',
  function() {
    var $ = jQuery;

    $('.wishlist_btn_div_non_js').hide();
    $('.wishlist_btn_div_js').show();
    
    if ( !$('.wishlistAddButtonInactive:visible, .wishlistDownButtonInactive:visible').filter(function(){return $(this).width()}).length) {
      $('.wishlistAddButtonActive, .wishlistDownButtonActive').show();
    } else {
      $('.wishlistAddButtonActive, .wishlistDownButtonActive').hide();
    }

    var destination = "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?ie=UTF8&isFauxAUI=&productGroupID=book_display_on_website&type=wishlist";
    if ($.browser.msie && parseInt($.browser.version) <= 6) {
      destination += '?sprited=0';
    }
    var scrollbarWidth = function() {
      var parent, child, width;
      parent = $('<div style="width:50px;height:50px;overflow:auto"><div/></div>').appendTo('body');
      child = parent.children();
      width = child.innerWidth()-child.height(99).innerWidth();
      parent.remove();
      return width;
    }();

    $('.wishlistDownButtonActive').removeAmazonPopoverTrigger().amazonPopoverTrigger({
      group: 'addToListButton',
      ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
      align: 'left',
      cacheable: true,
      destination: destination,
      draggable: false,
      loadingContent: '<div style="padding: 4px 28px;"><img  src="' + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + '" /></div>',
      
      location: function(popover, settings) {
        var e = $('.wishlistAddButtonActive').filter(function() { return $(this).width()});
        var p = e.position();
          return {
            top: p.top + e.height() - 5 ,
            left: p.left -4
          };
      },

      modal: false,
      onFilled: function(pop) {
        if (window.wlPop) {
          setTimeout(function() { wlPop.onFill(pop);},  0);
        }
      },
      onShow: function(popover, settings) {
        popover.remove();
        $('div.wishlist_popover_div').filter(function(){return $(this).parent().width()}).prepend(popover);

          popover.css('margin-left', - 0 - (scrollbarWidth/2) );
      },

      paddingLeft: 0,
      paddingRight: 0,
      showCloseButton: false,
      showOnHover: false,
      skin: null,
      title: null,
      width: 
170 
    });
    function hideKbpPromo() {
      if (typeof window.kbpPromo !== 'undefined' && typeof window.kbpPromo.hideKbpPromo === 'function') {
        window.kbpPromo.hideKbpPromo();
      }
    }
    $('.wishlistAddButtonActive, .wishlistDownButtonActive').click(hideKbpPromo);
  });
}

function setRegistryId(regStr, btnType) {
  var $ = jQuery;
  if (typeof btnType === 'undefined') {
    btnType = 'wishlist';
  }
  
  $("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
  $("[name='submit.add-to-registry."+btnType+"'],[name='submit.add-to-"+btnType+"']").eq(0).click();
  return false;
}

function clearText(thefield){
  if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
    thefield.value = "";
}
            </script>
            <script language="Javascript" type="text/javascript">
             amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    var $ = jQuery;
      if (typeof window.RegistryDP === 'undefined') {
        window.RegistryDP = {
          newCreateFlow: 1
        };
      }

      if (typeof window.RegistryDP.triggerAjaxAdd === 'undefined') {
        var ajaxAddState;
        var restoreAjaxAddState = function() {
          ajaxAddState = {
            action : "", 
            isAdding: "0",
            isFirstCreate : "0"
          };
        };
        restoreAjaxAddState();

        var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand', 'sourceCustomerOrgListID'];
        var sessionIdFields = ['rsid', 'session-id'];     

        var parseItemFields = function (btnClicked) {
          var itemArgs = {};
          var itemBuyForm = btnClicked.parents('form');
          
          $.each(itemBuyForm.serializeArray(), function(i, field){
            itemArgs[field.name] = field.value;
          });
          
          var formName = itemBuyForm.attr("name");
          itemArgs.isBuyXGetY = (formName == "BuyXGetYhandleBuy") ? 1 : 0; 
          return itemArgs;
        };

        var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
          var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
          var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
          var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
          var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
          if (btnName.match(re1)) {
            return btnNameParts[2];
          } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
            var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
            return parts[2];
          }
          return '';
        };

        var parsePopFields = function(btnClicked) {
          var itemBuyForm = btnClicked.parents('form');
          var inputVal = '';
          for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
            var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
            var field = itemBuyForm.find('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
            if (field && field.length) {
                inputVal = field.val();
            }
          }
          return inputVal;
        };

        var parseSessionIdFields = function(btnClicked) {
          var itemBuyForm = btnClicked.parents('form');  
          var inputVal = '';
          for (var i = 0; i < sessionIdFields.length; i++) {
            var fieldName = sessionIdFields[i];
            var field = itemBuyForm.find('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
            if (field && field.length) {
              inputVal = field.val();
            }
          }
          return inputVal;
        };

                var clearPopFields = function (btnClicked) {
          var itemBuyForm = btnClicked.parents('form');
          var inputVal = '';
          for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
            var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
            var field = itemBuyForm.find('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
            
            if (field && field.length) {
                inputVal = field.val();
                field.val("");
            }
          }

          if (inputVal) {
              var reNewGL = /^pop_new_giftlist_/;
              
              if (inputVal.match(reNewGL)) {
                $('#gl-create-pop').parents('.ap_popover').find('.ap_close').click();
              }
          }
        };

                var bindCloseHandler = function (popover) {
          popover.find('.ap_custom_close').click(popover.close);
          popover.keyup(function(e){
            if(e.which == 27 || e.keyCode == 27){
              popover.close();
            }
          });
        };

            
        var calculatePopoverWidth = function() {
          var viewportWidth = $(window).width();
          var popWidthPercent = 0.9;
          return (viewportWidth * popWidthPercent < 900) ? 900 : viewportWidth * popWidthPercent;
        };

        var bindResizeHandler = function (popover) {
          $(window).bind("resize", function(){
            var w = calculatePopoverWidth();
            popover.width(w);
            popover.reposition();
          });
        };

        var bindResizeHandlerForCreate = function (popover) {
          $(window).bind("resize", function(){
            popover.reposition();
            if (window.regCreate && window.regCreate.updatePopoverPosition) {
              window.regCreate.updatePopoverPosition();
            }
          });
        };

        var bindScrollHandler = function (popover) {
          $(window).scroll(function(){
            popover.reposition();
            if (window.regCreate && window.regCreate.updatePopoverPosition) {
              window.regCreate.updatePopoverPosition();
            }
          });
        };

        var checkAjaxAdd = function (btnClicked, btnType, sessionId) {            
          var popCommand = parsePopFields (btnClicked);
          $.ajax ({
            type: "POST",
            cache: false,
            url: '/gp/registry/huc/check-ajax-add.html',
            data: {
              sid : sessionId, 
              popCommand : popCommand,
              btnType: btnType,
              productGroupID: 'book_display_on_website'
            },
            dataType: "json", 
            timeout: 3000,
            success: function(response) {
              if (response && response.status == '1') {
                ajaxAddState.action = "add_pop";
                
                if (response.create && response.create !== '0') {
                  ajaxAddState.action = "create";
                  if (response.isFirstCreate) {
                    ajaxAddState.isFirstCreate = response.isFirstCreate;
                  }
                }
              } else {
                ajaxAddState.action = "add_default";
              }
              ajaxAddState.isAdding = "2";
              btnClicked.click();
            }, 
            error: function() {   
              ajaxAddState.isAdding = "2";
              ajaxAddState.action = "add_default";
              btnClicked.click();
            }
          });
        };

        var showAddPop = function (btnClicked, btnType, sessionId) {
          var spinner = 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/ui/loadIndicators/loading-large._V192238965_.gif';
          var popPlaceholder = '<div id="WLHUC_main" style="background:white"> <div id="WLHUC_spinner" style="height:600px;text-align:center;"> <img src="' + 
                               spinner + 
                               '" style="margin-top:280px"/> </div> <div id="WLHUC_result" style="display:none" /> </div>';
          var addPopover = $.AmazonPopover.displayPopover({
            width: calculatePopoverWidth,
            paddingLeft: 0,
            paddingRight: 0,
            paddingBottom: 0,
            showCloseButton: false,
            closeEventInclude: ['CLICK_OUTSIDE'],
            showOnHover: false,
            title: null,
            modal: true,
            cacheable: false,
            literalContent: popPlaceholder,
            group: 'addToListButton',
            location: function(popover, settings) {
              var delta = $(window).width() - calculatePopoverWidth();
              var posLeft = (delta > 0) ? delta/2 : 0;
              return {
                top: $('body').scrollTop() + 20,
                left: posLeft
              };
            },
            onShow: function(popover) {
              ajaxAddAsin(btnClicked, btnType, sessionId, popover);
            }, 
            onHide: function(popover) {
              if (window.regUpsell && window.regUpsell.swf && window.regUpsell.swf.clearStatus ) {
                window.regUpsell.swf.clearStatus();  
              }
              restoreAjaxAddState();
            }
          });      
        };

              
        var showCreatePop = function (btnClicked, btnType, sessionId) {
          var popPlaceholder = '<div id="WLNEW_main" style="background:white"><div id="WLNEW_spinner" style="display:none;text-align:center;height:50px;"><img style="margin-top:15px" src="' + 
                               AmazonPopoverImages.snake + '" /> </div></div>';

          var itemArgs = parseItemFields (btnClicked);
          itemArgs.store = 'books';
          itemArgs.productGroupID = 'book_display_on_website';
          itemArgs.nextSourceVendorId = 'website.createflow.assign';

          var postData = {
            'create_sid' : sessionId, 
            'create_type' : btnType,
            'create_sourceVendorId' : "website.createflow.assign", 
            'create_isFirst' : ajaxAddState.isFirstCreate,
            'create_nextAction' : 'add', 
            'create_includeEmptyList' : 1
          };
          $.extend(postData, itemArgs);

          var t;
          var createPopover = $.AmazonPopover.displayPopover({
            width: '380',
            paddingLeft: 0,
            paddingRight: 0,
            paddingBottom: 0,
            skin: null,
            showCloseButton: false,
            closeEventInclude: ['CLICK_OUTSIDE'],
            showOnHover: false,
            title: null,
            modal: true,
            cacheable: false,
            literalContent: popPlaceholder,
            location: 'centered',
            group: 'addToListButton',
            onShow: function(popover) {
              $.ajax ({
                type: "GET",
                cache: false,
                url: '/gp/registry/create/create-pop.html/ref=cm_wl_create_dp',
                data: postData,
                dataType: "json", 
                success: function(response) {
                  clearTimeout(t);
                  if (response && response.html) {
                    popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html);
                    bindCloseHandler(popover);
                    bindScrollHandler(popover);
                    bindResizeHandlerForCreate(popover);
                  } else {
                    popover.close();
                    forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                  }
                }, 
                error: popover.close
              });
            }, 
            onHide: function(popover) {
              clearPopFields(btnClicked);
              restoreAjaxAddState();
              if (window.regCreate && window.regCreate.clear) {
                window.regCreate.clear();
              }
            }, 
            onFilled: function(popover) {
              t = setTimeout(function(){
                $("#WLNEW_spinner").show();
              }, 500);
            }
          });      
        };

        var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {
          var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
          var form = btnClicked.parents('form');
          var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
          form.append($(inputName));
          form.submit();
        };

        var ajaxAddAsin = function (btnClicked, btnType, sessionId, popover) {
          var itemArgs = parseItemFields (btnClicked);
          
          var postData = itemArgs;
          postData.store = 'books';
          postData.type = btnType;
          postData.sid = sessionId;
          postData.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";

          $.ajax ({
              type: "POST",
              cache: false,
              url: '/gp/registry/huc/add-item-ajax.html',
              data: postData,
              dataType: "json", 
              success: function(response) {
                if (response && response.html) {
                  if (response.status && response.status == 'no-asins') {
                    popover.close();
                    forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);         
                  } else {
                    clearPopFields(btnClicked);
                    popover.find('#WLHUC_spinner').hide();
                    popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).show();
                    bindResizeHandler(popover);
                    bindCloseHandler(popover);
                  }
                } else {
                  popover.close();
                }
              }, 
              error: popover.close
          });
          return false;
        };

        window.RegistryDP.triggerAjaxAdd = function (event) {
          var btnClicked = $(event.target);
          var btnType = parseButtonType (btnClicked);
          var sessionId = parseSessionIdFields (btnClicked);
          
          if (btnType == '' || sessionId == '') {
            return true;
          }

          if (ajaxAddState.isAdding == "1") {
            return false;
          }

          if (ajaxAddState.action == "add_pop") {
            showAddPop(btnClicked, btnType, sessionId);
            return false;
          } else if (ajaxAddState.action == "create") {
            showCreatePop(btnClicked, btnType, sessionId);
            return false;
          } else if (ajaxAddState.action == "add_default") {
            restoreAjaxAddState();
            return true;
          } else {
            ajaxAddState.isAdding = "1";
            checkAjaxAdd(btnClicked, btnType, sessionId);
            return false;
          }
        };

      }

      $("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").unbind('click.wlHucPop').bind("click.wlHucPop", window.RegistryDP.triggerAjaxAdd);
      });
            </script>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <script type="text/javascript">
        amznJQ.onReady("jQuery", function() {
  if(typeof dpLdWidget !== 'undefined' && typeof dpLdWidget.deal !== 'undefined' && typeof dpLdWidget.deal.asins !== 'undefined' ){
    var dealPriceText;
    if( typeof Deal !== 'undefined' && typeof Deal.Price !== 'undefined' && typeof dpLdWidget.deal.asins[0] !== 'undefined' ){
       var dp = dpLdWidget.deal.asins[0].dealPrice;
       if ( dp.price > 0.0 ) {
         dealPriceText = Deal.Price.format(dp);
         jQuery("#rbb_bb_trigger .bb_price, #rentalPriceBlockGrid .buyNewOffers .rentPrice").html( dealPriceText );
       }
    }
  }
  
  jQuery("#rbbContainer .rbb_section .rbb_header").click(function(e) {
    var target = jQuery(e.target);
    if( !target.hasClass("rbb_header") ) target.parents(".rbbHeaderLink").attr("href", "javascript:void(0);");
     
    var t = jQuery(this);
    var header=t.hasClass("rbb_header") ? t : t.parents(".rbb_header");
    if (header.parents(".rbb_section").hasClass("selected")) {
    	return false;
    }
    
    jQuery("#radiobuyboxDivId .bb_radio").attr("checked", false);
    header.find('.bb_radio').attr("checked", "checked");
    header.parents(".rbb_section").removeClass("unselected").addClass("selected");
    
    jQuery("#radiobuyboxDivId .abbListInput").attr("checked", false);

    var bbClicked = jQuery(this).attr("id");
    var slideMeDown, slideMeUp;
    // animate here
    jQuery("#radiobuyboxDivId .rbb_section").each(function(i, bb){
      if(jQuery(bb).find(".rbb_header")[0].id == bbClicked ){
        slideMeDown = jQuery(bb);
      } else if(jQuery(bb).hasClass("selected")) {
        slideMeUp = jQuery(bb);
      }
    });


    slideMeUp.find(".rbb_content").slideUp(500, function(){
        slideMeUp.removeClass("selected").addClass("unselected");
    });
    slideMeDown.find(".rbb_content").slideDown(500);
    
    location.hash = "#selectedObb=" + header.attr("id");
    return true;
  });
  
  // Select correct buy box if user selects "Back" after clicking "Add to Cart"
  var locationHash = location.hash;
  if (locationHash.length != 0) {
  	var selectObb = locationHash.substring(1).split("=")[1];
  	if (typeof(selectObb) != "undefined") {
  		var target = jQuery("#" + selectObb);
  		if (target.length != 0) {
  			target.trigger('click');
  		}
  	}
  }
});
       </script>
       <div id="tradeInBuyboxFeatureDiv" style="padding-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; display: inline-block;  position: relative; width: 100%;">
        <div class="cBox buyBottomBox" style="border-top: 1px solid #6daee1;  z-index: 0">
         <span class="cBoxTL">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <span class="cBoxTR">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <span class="cBoxR">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <span class="cBoxBL">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <span class="cBoxBR">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <span class="cBoxB">
          <!-- &nbsp; -->
         </span>
         <div class="cBoxInner">
          <div style="text-align: center">
           <div class="small" style="font-weight: bold; padding-bottom: 3px;">
            Sell Us Your Item
           </div>
           <div style="margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 11px;">

             $22.91
            </span>
            Gift Card

       <script type="text/javascript">
        amznJQ.addLogical("cascade", ["http://kindleweb.s3.amazonaws.com/app/KindleReader-min.js"]);
       </script>
       <div id="kindleReaderContainer" style="display: none;">
       </div>
       <script type="text/javascript">
        var containerPad = 20;
  var extraPad = 40;
  var minWidth = 505;
  var minHeight = 355;
  var isTouchDevice = 0;

  function getPosition() {
    var posTop = (isTouchDevice ? 0 : jQuery(window).scrollTop()) + containerPad/4;
    var posLeft = (isTouchDevice ? 0 : jQuery(window).scrollLeft()) + containerPad/4;
    return { top : posTop, left : posLeft };
  }

  function setContainerDimensions() {
    var containerWidth = (isTouchDevice ? jQuery(document).width() : jQuery(window).width()) - 2 * containerPad;
    var containerHeight = (isTouchDevice ? 600 : jQuery(window).height()) - 2 * containerPad - extraPad;
    if (isTouchDevice && containerHeight > containerWidth) containerHeight = containerWidth;
    if (containerWidth < minWidth) containerWidth = minWidth;
    if (containerHeight < minHeight) containerHeight = minHeight;
    jQuery("#kindleReaderContainer").width(containerWidth);
    jQuery("#kindleReaderContainer").height(containerHeight);
  }

  function handleResizeAndScroll() {
    setContainerDimensions();
    var w = jQuery("#kindleReaderContainer").width();
    jQuery('.ap_popover_sprited').width(w + 36);
    jQuery('.ap_titlebar').width(w);
    jQuery('.ap_title').width(w - 34);

    var pos = getPosition();
    jQuery('.ap_popover_sprited').css('top', pos.top);
    jQuery('.ap_popover_sprited').css('left', pos.left);

    //debug stuff below
    var docSize = jQuery(document).width() + 'x' + jQuery(document).height();
    var winSize = jQuery(window).width() + 'x' + jQuery(window).height();
  }

   amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.criticalFeature", function() {
   amznJQ.available("cascade", function() {

    function loadKindleReader() {
    jQuery("body").css("overflow", "hidden");
    setContainerDimensions();

     jQuery.getJSON("https://kindle-app-service.amazon.com/?Operation=logMetric&ContentType=JSON&metric=cascadeT1clicked&JSONCallBack=?");

      jQuery.AmazonPopover.displayPopover({
      localContent: "#kindleReaderContainer",
      title: '<font color="#105a97">Amazon Kindle: </font><font color="#333333">Learning Python</font>',
      modal: true,
      closeEventExclude: ["CLICK_TRIGGER", "CLICK_OUTSIDE", "MOUSE_ENTER", "MOUSE_LEAVE"],
      onShow: function() {
        KindleReader.LoadSample({
          asin: 'B00DDZPC9S',
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          containerID: 'kindleReaderContainer'
          
        });

        
        jQuery('.ap_content').css('paddingTop', '8');
        jQuery('.ap_footer').hide();

        
        if (!isTouchDevice) {
          jQuery(window).resize(handleResizeAndScroll);
            jQuery(window).scroll(handleResizeAndScroll);
        }
          },
      onHide: function() {
        jQuery("body").css("overflow", "auto");
        jQuery("#kindleReaderContainer").empty();

        if (!isTouchDevice) {
            jQuery(window).unbind('resize', handleResizeAndScroll);
            jQuery(window).unbind('scroll', handleResizeAndScroll);
        }
          },
      width: null,
      location: getPosition,
      paddingLeft: 0,
      paddingRight: 0,
      paddingBottom: 0
    });

    if (jQuery('#kindleReaderIFrame').css('visibility') == 'hidden') {
        jQuery('#kindleReaderIFrame').css('visibility', 'visible');
    }

    if (isTouchDevice) {
    var w = jQuery("#kindleReaderContainer").width();
        jQuery('.ap_popover_sprited').width(w + 36);
        jQuery('.ap_titlebar').width(w);
        jQuery('.ap_title').width(w - 34);
    }
  };

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    jQuery("#KcpmKindleReaderSampleButton").click(loadKindleReader);
  });

  }); // end .available()
  }); // end .onCompletion

  if (window.location.href.match(/showKP=true/)) {
    jQuery(document).ready(loadKindleReader);
  }
       </script>

    <div class="jumpBar">
     <span class="tiny">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });

         <tr>
          <td class="rightBorder fastTrackRow">
           <div class="buying" id="ftMessage">
            <input name="promise-type" type="hidden" value="1-click"/>
            <input name="promise-item.1449355730" type="hidden" value="1398481200"/>
            <input name="promise-cutoff-time.1449355730" type="hidden" value="1398380400"/>
            <input name="promise-promised-shipoption.1449355730" type="hidden" value="next"/>
            <input name="promise-promised-address" type="hidden" value="jjjmqpopmp"/>
            <b>
             Want it Friday, April 25?
            </b>
            Order within
            <span id="ftCountdown" style="color: #009900; font-weight: bold;">
            </span>
            and choose
            <b>
             One-Day Shipping
            </b>
            at checkout.
            <script language="Javascript1.2" type="text/javascript">
             var ftCountdownElementIDs     = new Array();
    var ftEntireMessageElementIDs = new Array();
    var FT_CurrentDisplayMin      = new Array();
    var clientServerTimeDrift;

    var firstTimeUpdate = false;


    function ftRegisterCountdownElementID(elementID)
    {
      ftCountdownElementIDs[ftCountdownElementIDs.length] = elementID;
    }



    function ftRegisterEntireMessageElementID(elementID)
    {
      ftEntireMessageElementIDs[ftEntireMessageElementIDs.length] = elementID;
    }

    




function getTimeRemainingString( hours, minutes ) 
{
  var hourString   =  ( hours == 1 ? "hr" : "hrs" );
  var minuteString =  ( minutes  == 1 ? "min" : "mins" );

    if (hours == 0) {
      return minutes + " " + minuteString;
    }
    if (minutes == 0) {
      return hours + " " + hourString;
    }
  return hours + " " + hourString + " "  + minutes + " " + minuteString;
  return hours + " " + hourString + "  " + minutes + " " + minuteString;
}




    function FT_displayCountdown(forceUpdate)
    {
      if (!document.layers && !document.all && !document.getElementById) {
        return;
      }

      FT_showHtmlElement("ftShipString", true, "inline");

      var FT_remainSeconds = FT_givenSeconds - FT_actualSeconds;

      if (FT_remainSeconds < 1) {
        FT_showEntireMessageElement(false);
      }
	  
      var FT_secondsPerDay = 24 * 60 * 60;
      var FT_daysLong = FT_remainSeconds / FT_secondsPerDay;
      var FT_days = Math.floor(FT_daysLong);
      var FT_hoursLong = (FT_daysLong - FT_days) * 24;
      var FT_hours = Math.floor(FT_hoursLong);
      var FT_minsLong = (FT_hoursLong - FT_hours) * 60;
      var FT_mins = Math.floor(FT_minsLong);
      var FT_secsLong = (FT_minsLong - FT_mins) * 60;
      var FT_secs = Math.floor(FT_secsLong);

      if (FT_days > 0) {
        FT_hours = (FT_days * 24) + FT_hours;
      }

      window.setTimeout("FT_getTime()", 1000);

      var ftCountdown = getTimeRemainingString( FT_hours, FT_mins );

      for (var i = 0; i < ftCountdownElementIDs.length; i++) {
        var countdownElement = document.getElementById(ftCountdownElementIDs[i]);
        if (countdownElement) {
          if (FT_CurrentDisplayMin[i] != FT_mins || forceUpdate || countdownElement.innerHTML == "" || firstTimeUpdate) {
            countdownElement.innerHTML = ftCountdown;
            FT_CurrentDisplayMin[i] = FT_mins;
            firstTimeUpdate = false;
          }
        }
      }
    }



    function FT_showEntireMessageElement(shouldShow)
    {
      for (var i = 0; i < ftEntireMessageElementIDs.length; i++) {
        FT_showHtmlElement(ftEntireMessageElementIDs[i], shouldShow);
      }
    }



    function FT_showHtmlElement(elementID, shouldShow, displayStyle)
    {
      var element = document.getElementById( elementID );
      if (element) {
        if (shouldShow) {
          element.style.display = (displayStyle!=null)?displayStyle:"";
        } else {
          element.style.display = "none";
        }
      }
    }



    function FT_getAndClearCutOffEpochSeconds()
    {
      var ftCutOffEpochSecondsElementID = "ftCutOffEpochSeconds";
      var ftServerCurrentEpochSecondsElementID = "ftServerCurrentEpochSeconds";

      if (document.layers || document.all || document.getElementById) {
        if (document.getElementById( ftCutOffEpochSecondsElementID )) {
          var cutOffEpochSeconds = document.getElementById( ftCutOffEpochSecondsElementID ).innerHTML;

          if (cutOffEpochSeconds != "") {
            document.getElementById( ftCutOffEpochSecondsElementID ).innerHTML = "";

            if (clientServerTimeDrift == null && document.getElementById(ftServerCurrentEpochSecondsElementID)) {
              var serverCurrentEpochSeconds = document.getElementById( ftServerCurrentEpochSecondsElementID ).innerHTML * 1;
              clientServerTimeDrift = new Date().getTime()/1000 - serverCurrentEpochSeconds;
            }

            return (clientServerTimeDrift == null ? 0 : clientServerTimeDrift) + cutOffEpochSeconds * 1;
          }
        }
      }
      return 0;
    }



    function FT_getCountdown(secondsLeft)
    {
      var FT_currentTime = new Date();
      var FT_currentHours = FT_currentTime.getHours();
      var FT_currentMins = FT_currentTime.getMinutes();
      var FT_currentSecs = FT_currentTime.getSeconds();
      FT_givenSeconds = FT_currentHours * 3600 + FT_currentMins * 60 + FT_currentSecs;
      var FT_secondsFromCat = 63189;

      if (secondsLeft!=null)
      	FT_secondsFromCat=secondsLeft;
      FT_givenSeconds += FT_secondsFromCat;
      FT_getTime();
    }



    function FT_getTime()
    {
      var FT_newCurrentTime = new Date();
      var FT_actualHours = FT_newCurrentTime.getHours();
      var FT_actualMins = FT_newCurrentTime.getMinutes();
      var FT_actualSecs = FT_newCurrentTime.getSeconds();
      FT_actualSeconds = FT_actualHours * 3600 + FT_actualMins * 60 + FT_actualSecs;

      var cutOffTimeFromPageElement = FT_getAndClearCutOffEpochSeconds();
      if (cutOffTimeFromPageElement) {
        var countDownSeconds = cutOffTimeFromPageElement - FT_newCurrentTime.getTime()/1000;
        if (countDownSeconds>=1) {
          FT_showEntireMessageElement(true);
        }
        FT_givenSeconds = countDownSeconds + FT_actualSeconds;
      }

      FT_displayCountdown();
    }



    function onAjaxUpdate_fast_track(asin)
    {
      var timerDiv = document.getElementById("ftMessageTimer");
      var cutOffElems = document.getElementsByName("promise-cutoff-time."+asin);

      if (cutOffElems == null || cutOffElems.length == 0) {
        return;
      }

      if (timerDiv && timerDiv.style) {
        timerDiv.style.display = 'inline';
      }

      var cutOffTimeVal = cutOffElems[0].value;
      var cutOffTime = parseInt(cutOffTimeVal);
      var currSecs = new Date().getTime()/1000;
      var secsLeft = cutOffTime - currSecs; //countDown
      FT_getCountdown(secsLeft);
    }

    FT_getCountdown();
            </script>
